TEXT.English: The demon Hyborem has been vanquished, and his soul sent screaming back into the pits of Hell. His weapon, the unholy Gela, is all that remains of the mighty demon. Your forces, victorious, reach to claim the weapon that has been left behind. But it is up to you to decide what will become of this demonic legacy.
TEXT.French: The demon Hyborem has been vanquished, and his soul sent screaming back into the pits of Hell. His weapon, the unholy Gela, is all that remains of the mighty demon. Your forces, victorious, reach to claim the weapon that has been left behind. But it is up to you to decide what will become of this demonic legacy.
TEXT.German: Der Dämon Hyborem wurde vernichtet, und seine Seele wurde brüllend zurück in die Tiefen der Hölle geschickt. Alles, was zurück bleibt, ist seine Waffe, das Gela. Eure siegreichen Truppen machen sich auf, diese Wffe in ihren Besitz zu bringen. Es ist nun an Euch, zu entscheiden, was mit diesem dämonischen Vermächtnis geschehen soll.
TEXT.Italian: The demon Hyborem has been vanquished, and his soul sent screaming back into the pits of Hell. His weapon, the unholy Gela, is all that remains of the mighty demon. Your forces, victorious, reach to claim the weapon that has been left behind. But it is up to you to decide what will become of this demonic legacy.
TEXT.Spanish: The demon Hyborem has been vanquished, and his soul sent screaming back into the pits of Hell. His weapon, the unholy Gela, is all that remains of the mighty demon. Your forces, victorious, reach to claim the weapon that has been left behind. But it is up to you to decide what will become of this demonic legacy.

TEXT.English: I shall keep the weapon. It's strength shall become my own.
TEXT.French: I shall keep the weapon. It's strength shall become my own.
TEXT.German: Wir werden diese Waffe an Uns nehmen. Seine Stärke wird die Unsere werden.
TEXT.Italian: I shall keep the weapon. It's strength shall become my own.
TEXT.Spanish: I shall keep the weapon. It's strength shall become my own.

TEXT.English: The demonic taint must be washed from this trident. Shall we cleanse it in the waters of the Pool of Tears?
TEXT.French: The demonic taint must be washed from this trident. Shall we cleanse it in the waters of the Pool of Tears?
TEXT.German: Der dämonische Makel muss von diesem Dreizack gewaschen werden. Sollen wir die Waffe in im 'See der Tränen' reinigen?
TEXT.Italian: The demonic taint must be washed from this trident. Shall we cleanse it in the waters of the Pool of Tears?
TEXT.Spanish: The demonic taint must be washed from this trident. Shall we cleanse it in the waters of the Pool of Tears?

TEXT.English: The Gela must be disposed of quickly. Shall we hurl it into the great Maelstrom, banishing it to the ocean floor?
TEXT.French: The Gela must be disposed of quickly. Shall we it into the great Maelstrom, banishing it to the ocean floor?
TEXT.German: Wir müssen uns der Waffe schnell entledigen. Sollen wir es in den 'Großen Strudel' werfen und damit auf den Grund des Ozeans verbannen?
TEXT.Italian: The Gela must be disposed of quickly. Shall we it into the great Maelstrom, banishing it to the ocean floor?
TEXT.Spanish: The Gela must be disposed of quickly. Shall we it into the great Maelstrom, banishing it to the ocean floor?

TEXT.English: Only the angels of Basium will know how to handle this. Shall we entrust the Gela to their care and bring it to their Gate?
TEXT.French: Only the angels of Basium will know how to handle this. Shall we entrust the Gela to their care and bring it to their Gate?
TEXT.German: Nur die Engel von Basium wissen damit umzugehen. Sollen wir es ihrer Obhut übergeben und es zu ihrem Tor bringen?
TEXT.Italian: Only the angels of Basium will know how to handle this. Shall we entrust the Gela to their care and bring it to their Gate?
TEXT.Spanish: Only the angels of Basium will know how to handle this. Shall we entrust the Gela to their care and bring it to their Gate?

TEXT.English: The Gela must be destroyed! Shall we hurl it into the fires of Pyre of the Seraphic?
TEXT.French: The Gela must be destroyed! Shall we hurl it into the fires of Pyre of the Seraphic?
TEXT.German: Das Gela muss zerstört werden. Sollen wir es in die Feuer des 'Scheiterhaufens der Engel' werfen?
TEXT.Italian: The Gela must be destroyed! Shall we hurl it into the fires of Pyre of the Seraphic?
TEXT.Spanish: The Gela must be destroyed! Shall we hurl it into the fires of Pyre of the Seraphic?

TEXT.English: The Gela contains much demonic power. Perhaps we can harness it using the necromantic texts found in the Broken Sepulcher.
TEXT.French: The Gela contains much demonic power. Perhaps we can harness it using the necromantic texts found in the Broken Sepulcher.
TEXT.German: Das Gela birgt dämonische Kraft in sich. Vielleicht können wir sie nutzbar machen, mit Schriften aus dem 'Geöffnetem Grab'?
TEXT.Italian: The Gela contains much demonic power. Perhaps we can harness it using the necromantic texts found in the Broken Sepulcher.
TEXT.Spanish: The Gela contains much demonic power. Perhaps we can harness it using the necromantic texts found in the Broken Sepulcher.

TEXT.English: Perhaps the Gela can be used for good, if properly energized. Shall we let it soak up the holy power of the Sun at the Mirror of Heaven. But it will take time?
TEXT.French: Perhaps the Gela can be used for good, if properly energized. Shall we let it soak up the holy power of the Sun at the Mirror of Heaven. But it will take time?
TEXT.German: Vielleicht kann das Gela benutzt werden, um Gutes zu tun, wenn es die richtige Energie enthält. Sollen wir versuchen, es mit der heiligen Kraft der Sonne im 'Himmelsspiegel' zu tränken? Auch wenn es etwas Zeit bräuchte?
TEXT.Italian: Perhaps the Gela can be used for good, if properly energized. Shall we let it soak up the holy power of the Sun at the Mirror of Heaven. But it will take time?
TEXT.Spanish: Perhaps the Gela can be used for good, if properly energized. Shall we let it soak up the holy power of the Sun at the Mirror of Heaven. But it will take time?

TEXT.English: The Maelstrom consumes the trident quickly and, miraculously, the waves grow calm. A moment passes as the swirling vortex begins again. Out of the center walks a man with bowed head, wearing the robes of a priest. He is accompanied by four attendants. The Overlords must be pleased.
TEXT.French: The Maelstrom consumes the trident quickly and, miraculously, the waves grow calm. A moment passes as the swirling vortex begins again. Out of the center walks a man with bowed head, wearing the robes of a priest. He is accompanied by four attendants. The Overlords must be pleased.
TEXT.German: Der Mahlstrom schluckt den Dreizack schnell und ... wie durch ein Wunder beruhigen sich die Wellen. Ein Moment der Stille vergeht. Dann beginnt die Drehung des Studels von neuem. Aus seinem Zentrum schreitet ein Man mit gebogenem Bart, gekleidet in eine Priesterrobe. Er wird von vier Begleitern geleitet. Die Obersten Herren müssen zufrieden sein.
TEXT.Italian: The Maelstrom consumes the trident quickly and, miraculously, the waves grow calm. A moment passes as the swirling vortex begins again. Out of the center walks a man with bowed head, wearing the robes of a priest. He is accompanied by four attendants. The Overlords must be pleased.
TEXT.Spanish: The Maelstrom consumes the trident quickly and, miraculously, the waves grow calm. A moment passes as the swirling vortex begins again. Out of the center walks a man with bowed head, wearing the robes of a priest. He is accompanied by four attendants. The Overlords must be pleased.

TEXT.English: The ship is sacrificed and sucked into the turbulent vortex of the whirlpool. A moment passes, and then the seas turn red. A storm begins brewing on the horizon. Something is not right.
TEXT.French: The ship is sacrificed and sucked into the turbulent vortex of the whirlpool. A moment passes, and then the seas turn red. A storm begins brewing on the horizon. Something is not right.
TEXT.German: Das Schiff wird geopfert und in den stürmischen Strudel des Wirbels gezogen... Ein Moment verstreicht. Dann färbt sich das Meer rot. Ein Sturm braut sich am Horizont zusammen. Irgendetwas stimmt nicht.
TEXT.Italian: The ship is sacrificed and sucked into the turbulent vortex of the whirlpool. A moment passes, and then the seas turn red. A storm begins brewing on the horizon. Something is not right.
TEXT.Spanish: The ship is sacrificed and sucked into the turbulent vortex of the whirlpool. A moment passes, and then the seas turn red. A storm begins brewing on the horizon. Something is not right.

TEXT.English: Pike of Tears
TEXT.French: Pike of Tears
TEXT.German: Speer der Tränen
TEXT.Italian: Pike of Tears
TEXT.Spanish: Pike of Tears

TEXT.English: The Gela is plunged into the cold waters of the Pool of Tears. The demonic taint washes off from the weapon in waves of oily blackness, mixing with the spring. The Gela is no more, and in its place an even more powerful weapon has been created. But at what cost?
TEXT.French: The Gela is plunged into the cold waters of the Pool of Tears. The demonic taint washes off from the weapon in waves of oily blackness, mixing with the spring. The Gela is no more, and in its place an even more powerful weapon has been created. But at what cost?
TEXT.German: Das Gela versinkt in den kalten Wassern des 'Sees der Tränen'. Der dämonische Makel wird in Wellen einer schwarzen, öligen Dunkelheit von der Waffe gewaschen und mischt sich mit der Quelle. Das Gela existiert nicht mehr, doch an seiner Stelle wurde von der Quelle eine noch mächtigere Waffe freigegeben. Doch wie konnte das passieren? Zu welchem Preis?
TEXT.Italian: The Gela is plunged into the cold waters of the Pool of Tears. The demonic taint washes off from the weapon in waves of oily blackness, mixing with the spring. The Gela is no more, and in its place an even more powerful weapon has been created. But at what cost?
TEXT.Spanish: The Gela is plunged into the cold waters of the Pool of Tears. The demonic taint washes off from the weapon in waves of oily blackness, mixing with the spring. The Gela is no more, and in its place an even more powerful weapon has been created. But at what cost?

TEXT.English: The demon tainted water is carried far and wide throughout the land. The world suffers, as do the people of Erebus.
TEXT.French: The demon tainted water is carried far and wide throughout the land. The world suffers, as do the people of Erebus.
TEXT.German: Das Dämonenbefleckte Wasser sickert tief in das Land ein. Die Welt leidet, ebenso wie die Völker von Erebus.
TEXT.Italian: The demon tainted water is carried far and wide throughout the land. The world suffers, as do the people of Erebus.
TEXT.Spanish: The demon tainted water is carried far and wide throughout the land. The world suffers, as do the people of Erebus.

TEXT.English: Standing before the holy Gate of the Mercurians, the mighty Basium looks down upon you. You offer up the Gela, and the angel's massive hand reaches down to take it. You have done well to rid Erebus of the demon Hyborem. The angels shall sing your name in praise. But there is still much corruption in this land. Take one of my finest newly reborn warriors to aid you in your battle.
TEXT.French: Standing before the holy Gate of the Mercurians, the mighty Basium looks down upon you. You offer up the Gela, and the angel's massive hand reaches down to take it. You have done well to rid Erebus of the demon Hyborem. The angels shall sing your name in praise. But there is still much corruption in this land. Take one of my finest newly reborn warriors to aid you in your battle.
TEXT.German: Ihr steht vor dem heiligen Tor der Mercurianer, der mächtige Basium blickt zu Euch herunter. Ihr bietet ihm das Gela an, und die massive Hand des Engels greift herba und schließt sich um die Waffe: 'Ihr habt gut daran getan, die Welt vom Dämon Hyborem zu befreien. Die Engel werden Euren Namen in ihren Liedern singen und Euch preisen. Doch es gibt immer noch viel zu viel Verdorbenheit in diesen Landen. Nehmt einen meiner besten, der erst vor kurzem wiedergeborenen Kämpfer. Er wird Euch in Eurem Kampf beistehen.'
TEXT.Italian: Standing before the holy Gate of the Mercurians, the mighty Basium looks down upon you. You offer up the Gela, and the angel's massive hand reaches down to take it. You have done well to rid Erebus of the demon Hyborem. The angels shall sing your name in praise. But there is still much corruption in this land. Take one of my finest newly reborn warriors to aid you in your battle.
TEXT.Spanish: Standing before the holy Gate of the Mercurians, the mighty Basium looks down upon you. You offer up the Gela, and the angel's massive hand reaches down to take it. You have done well to rid Erebus of the demon Hyborem. The angels shall sing your name in praise. But there is still much corruption in this land. Take one of my finest newly reborn warriors to aid you in your battle.

TEXT.English: The Gela is hurled into the flames, which seem to flicker and burn eagerly for the demonic object. The fires die down for a moment before flaring into an intensity that scorches the ceiling of the great temple. Then, miraculously, the flames stop moving and grow black. A piercing cry fills the Pyre, and looking into the flame one can now see the tortured souls used to forge the trident wailing in despair.
TEXT.French: The Gela is hurled into the flames, which seem to flicker and burn eagerly for the demonic object. The fires die down for a moment before flaring into an intensity that scorches the ceiling of the great temple. Then, miraculously, the flames stop moving and grow black. A piercing cry fills the Pyre, and looking into the flame one can now see the tortured souls used to forge the trident wailing in despair.
TEXT.German: Das Gela wird in die Flammen geschleudert, welche sich gierig und flackernd auf die dämonische Waffe stürzen. Das Feuer erstirbt für einen Moment ... bevor es mit einer Intensität wieder aufflammt, die die Decke des großartigen Tempels versengt. Dann erstarren die Flammen vollständig und färben sich schwarz. Ein durchdringender Schrei erfüllt den Scheiterhaufen. In der Flamme kann man all die gequälten Seelen erblicken, die zum Schmieden des Dreizacks verzehrt worden waren. Ihre Schreie heulen in Verzweiflung.
TEXT.Italian: The Gela is hurled into the flames, which seem to flicker and burn eagerly for the demonic object. The fires die down for a moment before flaring into an intensity that scorches the ceiling of the great temple. Then, miraculously, the flames stop moving and grow black. A piercing cry fills the Pyre, and looking into the flame one can now see the tortured souls used to forge the trident wailing in despair.
TEXT.Spanish: The Gela is hurled into the flames, which seem to flicker and burn eagerly for the demonic object. The fires die down for a moment before flaring into an intensity that scorches the ceiling of the great temple. Then, miraculously, the flames stop moving and grow black. A piercing cry fills the Pyre, and looking into the flame one can now see the tortured souls used to forge the trident wailing in despair.

TEXT.English: The Gela is hurled into the flames, which seem to flicker and burn eagerly for the demonic object. The weapon hisses for a brief moment and then, for the first time since it was lit, the fires burn out. The very earth screams out in protest at the magical energies unleashed by the destruction of Gela. The ley lines leading to the Pyre, once invisible to the naked eye, are suddenly illuminated by the energy surging through them. The phenomenon fades, and the temple now lies in ruins.
TEXT.French: The Gela is hurled into the flames, which seem to flicker and burn eagerly for the demonic object. The weapon hisses for a brief moment and then, for the first time since it was lit, the fires burn out. The very earth screams out in protest at the magical energies unleashed by the destruction of Gela. The ley lines leading to the Pyre, once invisible to the naked eye, are suddenly illuminated by the energy surging through them. The phenomenon fades, and the temple now lies in ruins.
TEXT.German: as Gela wird in die Flammen geschleudert, welche sich gierig und flackernd auf die dämonische Waffe stürzen. Die Waffe zischt für einen kurzen Moment und dann erstirbtdas Feuer zum ersten Mal, seitdem es entzündet worden war. Die gesamte Erde erzittert prostentierend, als die magischen Energien des Gela durch die Zerstörung freigesetzt werden. Die Graslinien, die zum Scheiterhaufen führen, einst unsichtbar für das bloße Auge, erstrahlen plötzlich durch die sie durchströmende Energien. Die Erscheinung ebbt nach und nach ab und der Tempel liegt in Ruinen.
TEXT.Italian: The Gela is hurled into the flames, which seem to flicker and burn eagerly for the demonic object. The weapon hisses for a brief moment and then, for the first time since it was lit, the fires burn out. The very earth screams out in protest at the magical energies unleashed by the destruction of Gela. The ley lines leading to the Pyre, once invisible to the naked eye, are suddenly illuminated by the energy surging through them. The phenomenon fades, and the temple now lies in ruins.
TEXT.Spanish: The Gela is hurled into the flames, which seem to flicker and burn eagerly for the demonic object. The weapon hisses for a brief moment and then, for the first time since it was lit, the fires burn out. The very earth screams out in protest at the magical energies unleashed by the destruction of Gela. The ley lines leading to the Pyre, once invisible to the naked eye, are suddenly illuminated by the energy surging through them. The phenomenon fades, and the temple now lies in ruins.

TEXT.English: Frozen Flame
TEXT.French: Flamme gelée
TEXT.German: Gefrorene Flamme
TEXT.Italian: Frozen Flame
TEXT.Spanish: Frozen Flame

TEXT.English: Take Frozen Flame
TEXT.French: Take Frozen Flame
TEXT.German: Nimm die 'Gefrorene Flamme'
TEXT.Italian: Take Frozen Flame
TEXT.Spanish: Take Frozen Flame

TEXT.English: Drop Frozen Flame
TEXT.French: Drop Frozen Flame
TEXT.German: Lass die 'Gefrorene Flamme' fallen
TEXT.Italian: Drop Frozen Flame
TEXT.Spanish: Drop Frozen Flame

TEXT.English: Using the necromantic texts found in the libraries left behind by Barbatos, you learn how to twist the demonic powers of the Gela to your will. This ritual will unravel the unholy markings of the weapon, allowing you to guide the spirits of the recently departed away from Hell and into your own kingdom. It requires thousands of sacrifices. You are fairly certain you have enough willing subjects.
TEXT.French: Using the necromantic texts found in the libraries left behind by Barbatos, you learn how to twist the demonic powers of the Gela to your will. This ritual will unravel the unholy markings of the weapon, allowing you to guide the spirits of the recently departed away from Hell and into your own kingdom. It requires thousands of sacrifices. You are fairly certain you have enough willing subjects.
TEXT.German: Mit den nekromantischen Schriften, die von Barbatos in den Bibliotheken zurückgelassen worden sind, erfahrt Ihr, wie Ihr die dämonischen Mächte des Gela Eurem Willen unterwerfen könnt. Dieses Ritual entfernt die unheiligen Inschriften der Waffe, was Euch erlaubt, die Geister der kürzlich verstorbenen auf ihrem Weg in die Hölle in Euer Reich leiten könnt. Es erfordert Tausende von Opfern. Doch Ihr seid Euch sicher, dass Ihr genügend Freiwillige finden werdet.
TEXT.Italian: Using the necromantic texts found in the libraries left behind by Barbatos, you learn how to twist the demonic powers of the Gela to your will. This ritual will unravel the unholy markings of the weapon, allowing you to guide the spirits of the recently departed away from Hell and into your own kingdom. It requires thousands of sacrifices. You are fairly certain you have enough willing subjects.
TEXT.Spanish: Using the necromantic texts found in the libraries left behind by Barbatos, you learn how to twist the demonic powers of the Gela to your will. This ritual will unravel the unholy markings of the weapon, allowing you to guide the spirits of the recently departed away from Hell and into your own kingdom. It requires thousands of sacrifices. You are fairly certain you have enough willing subjects.

TEXT.English: Your people place the Gela in the center of the Mirror of Heaven. Inky black smoke begins to rise from the weapon in plumes as the sun purifies it. After a while, the weapon ceases to smoke, and the light of the Mirror shines brilliantly off of its surface. The taint is removed, and in its place a holy trident of great power remains. This has surely attracted the attention of any demons nearby but your unit needs some time to control the power of the trident.
TEXT.French: Your people place the Gela in the center of the Mirror of Heaven. Inky black smoke begins to rise from the weapon in plumes as the sun purifies it. After a while, the weapon ceases to smoke, and the light of the Mirror shines brilliantly off of its surface. The taint is removed, and in its place a holy trident of great power remains. This has surely attracted the attention of any demons nearby but your unit needs some time to control the power of the trident.
TEXT.German: Eure Leute platzieren das Gela in der Mitte des Himmelsspiegels. Rauch, schwarz wie Tinte, beginnt, sich von der Waffe zu erheben, in kleinen Abgasen und die Sonne reinigt ihn. Nach einer Weile wird die Waffe vollständig zu Rauch und das Licht des Himmelsspiegels scheint heller und heller und an der Stelle des Gela manifestiert sich ein heiliger Dreizack von großer Macht. Das hat mit Sicherheit Dämonen in der Nähe angezogen. Eure Einheit benötigt jedoch noch etwas Zeit, um die Macht des Dreizacks zu beherrschen.
TEXT.Italian: Your people place the Gela in the center of the Mirror of Heaven. Inky black smoke begins to rise from the weapon in plumes as the sun purifies it. After a while, the weapon ceases to smoke, and the light of the Mirror shines brilliantly off of its surface. The taint is removed, and in its place a holy trident of great power remains. This has surely attracted the attention of any demons nearby but your unit needs some time to control the power of the trident.
TEXT.Spanish: Your people place the Gela in the center of the Mirror of Heaven. Inky black smoke begins to rise from the weapon in plumes as the sun purifies it. After a while, the weapon ceases to smoke, and the light of the Mirror shines brilliantly off of its surface. The taint is removed, and in its place a holy trident of great power remains. This has surely attracted the attention of any demons nearby but your unit needs some time to control the power of the trident.

TEXT.English: Take Sol
TEXT.French: Take Sol
TEXT.German: Nimm 'Sol'
TEXT.Italian: Take Sol
TEXT.Spanish: Take Sol

TEXT.English: Sol
TEXT.French: Sol
TEXT.German: Sol
TEXT.Italian: Sol
TEXT.Spanish: Sol

TEXT.English: A strange adept has recently joined the mage guild of %s2_city. While the student is incredibly smart and talented, all the other students and even some of the instructors steer clear of him. Many claim he delves deeply in necromancy and dark arts, some have observed strange experiments, and everyone says that anyone who gets in his way often falls victim to some strange circumstance.
TEXT.French: A strange adept has recently joined the mage guild of %s2_city. While the student is incredibly smart and talented, all the other students and even some of the instructors steer clear of him. Many claim he delves deeply in necromancy and dark arts, some have observed strange experiments, and everyone says that anyone who gets in his way often falls victim to some strange circumstance.
TEXT.German: Der Magische Zirkel von %s2_city hat kürzlich einen neuen Adepten dazugewonnen. Obwohl er unglaublich klug und begabt ist, halten sich alle anderen Studenten und selbst einige der Ausbilder von ihm fern. Viel behaupten, er befasse sich eingehend mit Nekromantie und dunklen Künsten, andere wollen sogar absonderliche Experimente beobachtet haben, und alle sagen, dass jeder, der ihm in die Quere kommt, durch irgendwelche seltsamen Umstände zu Tode kommt.
TEXT.Italian: A strange adept has recently joined the mage guild of %s2_city. While the student is incredibly smart and talented, all the other students and even some of the instructors steer clear of him. Many claim he delves deeply in necromancy and dark arts, some have observed strange experiments, and everyone says that anyone who gets in his way often falls victim to some strange circumstance.
TEXT.Spanish: A strange adept has recently joined the mage guild of %s2_city. While the student is incredibly smart and talented, all the other students and even some of the instructors steer clear of him. Many claim he delves deeply in necromancy and dark arts, some have observed strange experiments, and everyone says that anyone who gets in his way often falls victim to some strange circumstance.

TEXT.English: Disturbing, but let the instructors handle it how they will.
TEXT.French: Disturbing, but let the instructors handle it how they will.
TEXT.German: Etwas seltsam, ja. Doch lasst die Ausbilder sich der Sache nach ihrem Gutdünken annehmen.
TEXT.Italian: Disturbing, but let the instructors handle it how they will.
TEXT.Spanish: Disturbing, but let the instructors handle it how they will.

TEXT.English: We need all the proficient Adepts we can get our hands on, let him serve the nation.
TEXT.French: We need all the proficient Adepts we can get our hands on, let him serve the nation.
TEXT.German: We brauchen alle tüchtigen Adepten, deren wir habhaft werden können. Er soll unserem Volk dienen.
TEXT.Italian: We need all the proficient Adepts we can get our hands on, let him serve the nation.
TEXT.Spanish: We need all the proficient Adepts we can get our hands on, let him serve the nation.

TEXT.English: You tell me this as if it's a problem. Have him advanced immediately.
TEXT.French: You tell me this as if it's a problem. Have him advanced immediately.
TEXT.German: Warum klingt das in dem Bericht, als wäre das ein Problem? Er soll umgehend befördert werden!
TEXT.Italian: You tell me this as if it's a problem. Have him advanced immediately.
TEXT.Spanish: You tell me this as if it's a problem. Have him advanced immediately.

TEXT.English: Dark arts? Expel him from our country, he is not welcome here!
TEXT.French: Dark arts? Expel him from our country, he is not welcome here!
TEXT.German: Dunkle Künste? Werft ihn aus unseren Landen! Er ist hier nicht willkommen!
TEXT.Italian: Dark arts? Expel him from our country, he is not welcome here!
TEXT.Spanish: Dark arts? Expel him from our country, he is not welcome here!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Gain Adept with Death I and Entropy I
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Obtenez un adepte avec les promotions Mort I et Entropie I
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Erhalte Adept mit 'Tod I' und 'Entropie I'
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Gain Adept with Death I and Entropy I
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Gain Adept with Death I and Entropy I

TEXT.English: A band of haggard refugees has shown up outside %s2_city. The leader of the group says that they had stumbled upon the true nature of the Ashen Veil religion, much to the chagrin of the higher-ups in their nation. Not wanting to live in Hell, assist it in any way, or become the next demonic sacrifice for what they know, they had no choice but to flee. They seek refuge in a land where they can live free of Hell's taint, and if possible, fight back.
TEXT.French: A band of haggard refugees has shown up outside %s2_city. The leader of the group says that they had stumbled upon the true nature of the Ashen Veil religion, much to the chagrin of the higher-ups in their nation. Not wanting to live in Hell, assist it in any way, or become the next demonic sacrifice for what they know, they had no choice but to flee. They seek refuge in a land where they can live free of Hell's taint, and if possible, fight back.
TEXT.German: Eine Bande von abgemagerten Flüchtlingen ist vor den Toren von %s2_city aufgetaucht. Der Führer der Gruppe erklärt, dass sie die wahre Natur der Religion des 'Aschfahlen Schleiers' erkannt haben, sehr zum Ärger der Oberen ihres Volkes. Komme was wolle, sie wollten nicht in der Hölle leben oder das nächste Opfer für was auch immer für werden und sahen deshalb keine andere Möglichkeit als die Flucht. Sie bitten um Asyl in einem Land, wo sie frei vom Makel der Hölle leben können und hoffe, eines Tages etwas zurückgeben zu können.
TEXT.Italian: A band of haggard refugees has shown up outside %s2_city. The leader of the group says that they had stumbled upon the true nature of the Ashen Veil religion, much to the chagrin of the higher-ups in their nation. Not wanting to live in Hell, assist it in any way, or become the next demonic sacrifice for what they know, they had no choice but to flee. They seek refuge in a land where they can live free of Hell's taint, and if possible, fight back.
TEXT.Spanish: A band of haggard refugees has shown up outside %s2_city. The leader of the group says that they had stumbled upon the true nature of the Ashen Veil religion, much to the chagrin of the higher-ups in their nation. Not wanting to live in Hell, assist it in any way, or become the next demonic sacrifice for what they know, they had no choice but to flee. They seek refuge in a land where they can live free of Hell's taint, and if possible, fight back.

TEXT.English: If they come from an Ashen Veil civilization, they already have Hell's taint upon them. Close our borders to them.
TEXT.French: If they come from an Ashen Veil civilization, they already have Hell's taint upon them. Close our borders to them.
TEXT.German: Wenn sie wirklich aus dem Hoheitsgebiet des Aschfahlen Schleiers kommen, dann tragen sie bereits den Makel der Hölle mit sich. Schließt die Grenzen und lasst sie nicht ein!
TEXT.Italian: If they come from an Ashen Veil civilization, they already have Hell's taint upon them. Close our borders to them.
TEXT.Spanish: If they come from an Ashen Veil civilization, they already have Hell's taint upon them. Close our borders to them.

TEXT.English: Any enemy of evil is a friend of ours. Welcome them with open arms and set up housing.
TEXT.French: Any enemy of evil is a friend of ours. Welcome them with open arms and set up housing.
TEXT.German: Jeder Feind des Bösen ist unser Freund. Heißt sie mit offenen Armen willkommen und sorgt für ihre Unterbringung.
TEXT.Italian: Any enemy of evil is a friend of ours. Welcome them with open arms and set up housing.
TEXT.Spanish: Any enemy of evil is a friend of ours. Welcome them with open arms and set up housing.

TEXT.English: If they can escape an Ashen Veil nation, they must be very blessed and hardy! Have them enlist in our army.
TEXT.French: If they can escape an Ashen Veil nation, they must be very blessed and hardy! Have them enlist in our army.
TEXT.German: Sie wollen etwas zurückgeben? Wenn sie dem Aschfahlen Schleier entkommen konnten, müssen sie sehr abgehärtet und außerdem gesegnet sein. Teilt sie unseren Truppen zu!
TEXT.Italian: If they can escape an Ashen Veil nation, they must be very blessed and hardy! Have them enlist in our army.
TEXT.Spanish: If they can escape an Ashen Veil nation, they must be very blessed and hardy! Have them enlist in our army.

TEXT.English: Receive 2 Champions with Blessed and Demon Slaying
TEXT.French: Receive 2 Champions with Blessed and Demon Slaying
TEXT.German: Erhalte 2 Champions mit 'Gesegnet' und 'Dämonenschlächter'
TEXT.Italian: Receive 2 Champions with Blessed and Demon Slaying
TEXT.Spanish: Receive 2 Champions with Blessed and Demon Slaying

TEXT.English: Hell's reach is strong, and they know the worst of it. Give their leadership a high religious position, that they may spread their words of truth and give needed advice.
TEXT.French: Hell's reach is strong, and they know the worst of it. Give their leadership a high religious position, that they may spread their words of truth and give needed advice.
TEXT.German: Der Arm der Hölle reicht weit und ist stark, sie müssten es am besten wissen. Gebt ihren Anführern einen hohen Rang in unserer Geistlichkeit, damit sie die Wahrheit verbreiten und Bedürftigen helfen können.
TEXT.Italian: Hell's reach is strong, and they know the worst of it. Give their leadership a high religious position, that they may spread their words of truth and give needed advice.
TEXT.Spanish: Hell's reach is strong, and they know the worst of it. Give their leadership a high religious position, that they may spread their words of truth and give needed advice.

TEXT.English: Receive a Prior
TEXT.French: Receive a Prior
TEXT.German: Erhalte einen Ältesten
TEXT.Italian: Receive a Prior
TEXT.Spanish: Receive a Prior

TEXT.English: We do not need the eyes of Hell upon us. Sell them back to their Ashen Veil masters at the highest price so that we may avoid confrontation.
TEXT.French: We do not need the eyes of Hell upon us. Sell them back to their Ashen Veil masters at the highest price so that we may avoid confrontation.
TEXT.German: Wir wollen nicht die Augen der Hülle auf uns gerichtet sehen. Fangt und verkauft sie zum höchstmöglichen Preis an ihre Herren vom Aschfahlen Schleier. Wir wollen keine Konfrontation.
TEXT.Italian: We do not need the eyes of Hell upon us. Sell them back to their Ashen Veil masters at the highest price so that we may avoid confrontation.
TEXT.Spanish: We do not need the eyes of Hell upon us. Sell them back to their Ashen Veil masters at the highest price so that we may avoid confrontation.

TEXT.English: Sign Peace with Veil Civilizations
TEXT.French: Sign Peace with Veil Civilizations
TEXT.German: Schließe Frieden mit allen Zivilisationen des Aschfahlen Schleiers
TEXT.Italian: Sign Peace with Veil Civilizations
TEXT.Spanish: Sign Peace with Veil Civilizations

TEXT.English: There has been a recent surge of promising young scholars wishing to study science, magic, and the arcane. %s2_city's current facilities will be overcrowded with activity and suffer material shortages. Additional funding will be needed to expand and accommodate everyone.
TEXT.French: There has been a recent surge of promising young scholars wishing to study science, magic, and the arcane. %s2_city's current facilities will be overcrowded with activity and suffer material shortages. Additional funding will be needed to expand and accommodate everyone.
TEXT.German: Kürzlich gab es einen Anstieg an vielversprechenden jungen Gelehrten, die sich für Forschung oder magische Studien einschreiben wollen. Die derzeitigen Einrichtungen von %s2_city werden bald überfüllt sein und einen Mangel an Lehrmaterial haben. Zusätzliche Gelder sind für eine Erweiterung und Unterbringung aller Interessenten nötig.
TEXT.Italian: There has been a recent surge of promising young scholars wishing to study science, magic, and the arcane. %s2_city's current facilities will be overcrowded with activity and suffer material shortages. Additional funding will be needed to expand and accommodate everyone.
TEXT.Spanish: There has been a recent surge of promising young scholars wishing to study science, magic, and the arcane. %s2_city's current facilities will be overcrowded with activity and suffer material shortages. Additional funding will be needed to expand and accommodate everyone.

TEXT.English: We cannot afford it.
TEXT.French: We cannot afford it.
TEXT.German: Nein. Das können wir uns nicht leisten.
TEXT.Italian: We cannot afford it.
TEXT.Spanish: We cannot afford it.

TEXT.English: Scholarly study is the foundation of advancement! Expand our libraries.
TEXT.French: Scholarly study is the foundation of advancement! Expand our libraries.
TEXT.German: Wissenschaftliche Studien sind das Fundament unseres Fortschritts. Baut die Biobliotheken aus!
TEXT.Italian: Scholarly study is the foundation of advancement! Expand our libraries.
TEXT.Spanish: Scholarly study is the foundation of advancement! Expand our libraries.

TEXT.English: Wizardly study is the foundation of advancement! Expand our mage guild.
TEXT.French: Wizardly study is the foundation of advancement! Expand our mage guild.
TEXT.German: Wissenschaftliche Studien sind das Fundament unseres Fortschritts. Baut den Magischer Zirkel aus!
TEXT.Italian: Wizardly study is the foundation of advancement! Expand our mage guild.
TEXT.Spanish: Wizardly study is the foundation of advancement! Expand our mage guild.

TEXT.English: Sounds like good news. Build them a Mage Guild.
TEXT.French: Sounds like good news. Build them a Mage Guild.
TEXT.German: Klingt nach guten Nachrichten. Errichtet einen Magischen Zirkel.
TEXT.Italian: Sounds like good news. Build them a Mage Guild.
TEXT.Spanish: Sounds like good news. Build them a Mage Guild.

TEXT.English: Our adepts need a place to read the trials and achievements of their predecessors. Let's build a library.
TEXT.French: Our adepts need a place to read the trials and achievements of their predecessors. Let's build a library.
TEXT.German: Our adepts need a place to read the trials and achievements of their predecessors. Let's build a library.
TEXT.Italian: Our adepts need a place to read the trials and achievements of their predecessors. Let's build a library.
TEXT.Spanish: Our adepts need a place to read the trials and achievements of their predecessors. Let's build a library.

TEXT.English: Scholarly societies are for the weak. Press these foolish youths into our army.
TEXT.French: Scholarly societies are for the weak. Press these foolish youths into our army.
TEXT.German: Wissenschaft ist etwas für Schwächlinge. Sie wissen nicht wohin? Teilt sie unserer Armee zu!
TEXT.Italian: Scholarly societies are for the weak. Press these foolish youths into our army.
TEXT.Spanish: Scholarly societies are for the weak. Press these foolish youths into our army.

TEXT.English: Receive 2 Warriors
TEXT.French: Obtenez 2 guerriers
TEXT.German: Erhalte 2 Krieger
TEXT.Italian: Receive 2 Warriors
TEXT.Spanish: Receive 2 Warriors

TEXT.English: Some Frostlings were trapped and caught by hunters near %s2_city. What do you want to do with them?
TEXT.French: Some Frostlings were trapped and caught by hunters near %s2_city. What do you want to do with them?
TEXT.German: Einige Frostlinge sind unseren Jägern in der Nähe von %s2_city in die Falle gegangen. Was soll mit ihnen geschehen?
TEXT.Italian: Some Frostlings were trapped and caught by hunters near %s2_city. What do you want to do with them?
TEXT.Spanish: Some Frostlings were trapped and caught by hunters near %s2_city. What do you want to do with them?

TEXT.English: Just kill them.
TEXT.French: Just kill them.
TEXT.German: Nun, tötet sie einfach.
TEXT.Italian: Just kill them.
TEXT.Spanish: Just kill them.

TEXT.English: Pity those miserable creatures. Release them, they are harmless.
TEXT.French: Pity those miserable creatures. Release them, they are harmless.
TEXT.German: Habt Mitleid mit diesen erbärmlichen Kreaturen. Lasst sie frei, sie sind doch harmlos.
TEXT.Italian: Pity those miserable creatures. Release them, they are harmless.
TEXT.Spanish: Pity those miserable creatures. Release them, they are harmless.

TEXT.English: a Barbarian Frostling spawns in the surroundings of the city.
TEXT.French: Un Gelbionte barbare apparaît à proximité de la ville.
TEXT.German: Ein Frostling erscheint in der Umgebung der Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: a Barbarian Frostling spawns in the surroundings of the city.
TEXT.Spanish: a Barbarian Frostling spawns in the surroundings of the city.

TEXT.English: Strange creatures! Add them to the freak show, they are amusing!
TEXT.French: Voilà des créatures bien étranges ! Qu'on les ajoute au Spectacle de monstres, elles ont l'air amusantes !
TEXT.German: Seltsame Kreaturen! Übergebt sie der Abnormitätenschau, sie sind lustig!
TEXT.Italian: Strange creatures! Add them to the freak show, they are amusing!
TEXT.Spanish: Strange creatures! Add them to the freak show, they are amusing!

TEXT.English: Freak Show: + 4[ICON_CULTURE]
TEXT.French: Spectacle de monstres : + 4[ICON_CULTURE]
TEXT.German: Abnormitätenschau: + 4[ICON_CULTURE]
TEXT.Italian: Freak Show: + 4[ICON_CULTURE]
TEXT.Spanish: Freak Show: + 4[ICON_CULTURE]

TEXT.English: Eat them.
TEXT.French: Mangez-les !
TEXT.German: Esst sie.
TEXT.Italian: Eat them.
TEXT.Spanish: Eat them.

TEXT.English: Hire them. They are our brothers.
TEXT.French: Engagez-les ! Ce sont nos frères.
TEXT.German: Heuert sie an, sie sind unsere Brüder.
TEXT.Italian: Hire them. They are our brothers.
TEXT.Spanish: Hire them. They are our brothers.

TEXT.English: Receive a Frostling with Strong.
TEXT.French: Obtenir un Gelbionte fort.
TEXT.German: Erhalte einen Frostling mit 'Stark'
TEXT.Italian: Receive a Frostling with Strong.
TEXT.Spanish: Receive a Frostling with Strong.

TEXT.English: Some people are demonstrating against the endless war in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: Des citoyens manifestent contre la guerre interminable à %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Einige Leute demonstrieren in %s2_city gegen diesen unendlichen Krieg.
TEXT.Italian: Some people are demonstrating against the endless war in %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: Some people are demonstrating against the endless war in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: And I should care... why?
TEXT.French: Et ça devrait me concerner... pourquoi ?
TEXT.German: Und das sollte mich kümmern ... warum?
TEXT.Italian: And I should care... why?
TEXT.Spanish: And I should care... why?

TEXT.English: They are right, I will start the negotiations.
TEXT.French: Ils ont raison. Je vais lancer les pourparlers.
TEXT.German: Ja, sie haben recht, ich werde Verhandlungen aufnehmen.
TEXT.Italian: They are right, I will start the negotiations.
TEXT.Spanish: They are right, I will start the negotiations.

TEXT.English: Increases War Weariness by 25%
TEXT.French: Augmente la lassitude de guerre de 25%
TEXT.German: Erhöht die Kriegsmüdigkeit um 25%
TEXT.Italian: Increases War Weariness by 25%
TEXT.Spanish: Increases War Weariness by 25%

TEXT.English: Repress them before they spread.
TEXT.French: Jugulez cette agitation avant que ça se propage
TEXT.German: Unterdrückt das, bevor es sich ausbreitet.
TEXT.Italian: Repress them before they spread.
TEXT.Spanish: Repress them before they spread.

TEXT.English: Every Unit in the City gains 3 XP
TEXT.French: Chaque unité dans la ville reçoit 3 EXP
TEXT.German: Jede Einheit in der Stadt erhält 3 EP
TEXT.Italian: Every Unit in the City gains 3 XP
TEXT.Spanish: Every Unit in the City gains 3 XP

TEXT.English: Send them to the front lines. They will learn how to fight.
TEXT.French: Envoyez-les sur la ligne de front. Ils apprendront à se battre.
TEXT.German: Schickt sie an die vorderste Front. Sie werden das Kämpfen schon noch lernen.
TEXT.Italian: Send them to the front lines. They will learn how to fight.
TEXT.Spanish: Send them to the front lines. They will learn how to fight.

TEXT.English: Receives 1 Weak Axeman
TEXT.French: Recevoir 1 Soldat avec Hache faible
TEXT.German: Erhalte 1 Axtkäpfer mit 'Schwach'
TEXT.Italian: Receives 1 Weak Axeman
TEXT.Spanish: Receives 1 Weak Axeman

TEXT.English: Hmm... let's have lunch!
TEXT.French: Mhm... Allons déjeuner !
TEXT.German: Hmm... lasst uns zu Mittag essen!
TEXT.Italian: Hmm... let's have lunch!
TEXT.Spanish: Hmm... let's have lunch!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Every vampiric unit in the City gains 3 XP[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Decreases War Weariness by 10%
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Chaque unité vampirique dans la ville reçoit 3 EXP[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Réduit la lassitude de guerre de 10%
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Jede vampirische Einheit der Stadt erhält 3 EP.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Verringert die Kriegsmüdigkeit um 10%
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Every vampiric unit in the City gains 3 XP[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Decreases War Weariness by 10%
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Every vampiric unit in the City gains 3 XP[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Decreases War Weariness by 10%

TEXT.English: A newborn child in %s2_city has been reported to carry the mark of Agares. What should we do?
TEXT.French: A newborn child in %s2_city has been reported to carry the mark of Agares. What should we do?
TEXT.German: Es wird berichtet, dass in der Stadt %s2_city geborenenes Kind das Mal des Agares trägt. Was sollen wir tun?
TEXT.Italian: A newborn child in %s2_city has been reported to carry the mark of Agares. What should we do?
TEXT.Spanish: A newborn child in %s2_city has been reported to carry the mark of Agares. What should we do?

TEXT.English: Leave the matter to local officials.
TEXT.French: Leave the matter to local officials.
TEXT.German: Überlasst die Angelegenheit den örtlichen Bhörden.
TEXT.Italian: Leave the matter to local officials.
TEXT.Spanish: Leave the matter to local officials.

TEXT.English: Wondrous! If the king of hope moves upon Erebus, then we shall honor his chosen.
TEXT.French: Wondrous! If the king of hope moves upon Erebus, then we shall honor his chosen.
TEXT.German: Wunderbar! Wenn der König der Hoffnung auf Erebus wandelt, werden wir seinen Erwühlten ehren.
TEXT.Italian: Wondrous! If the king of hope moves upon Erebus, then we shall honor his chosen.
TEXT.Spanish: Wondrous! If the king of hope moves upon Erebus, then we shall honor his chosen.

TEXT.English: Receives a Great Prophet
TEXT.French: Receives a Great Prophet
TEXT.German: Erhalte einen Großen Propheten
TEXT.Italian: Receives a Great Prophet
TEXT.Spanish: Receives a Great Prophet

TEXT.English: Excellent. If the King of Hope has marked this one, he shall show great service to him. Train him in our temples.
TEXT.French: Excellent. If the King of Hope has marked this one, he shall show great service to him. Train him in our temples.
TEXT.German: Exzellent. Wenn der König der Hoffnung diesen einen gezeichnet hat, wird er von besonders großem Wert für uns sein. Bildet ihn in unseren Tempeln aus.
TEXT.Italian: Excellent. If the King of Hope has marked this one, he shall show great service to him. Train him in our temples.
TEXT.Spanish: Excellent. If the King of Hope has marked this one, he shall show great service to him. Train him in our temples.

TEXT.English: Receives a Profane with Prophecy Mark
TEXT.French: Receives a Profane with Prophecy Mark
TEXT.German: Erhalte einen Gotteslästerer mit dem Fluch der Vorhersehung
TEXT.Italian: Receives a Profane with Prophecy Mark
TEXT.Spanish: Receives a Profane with Prophecy Mark

TEXT.English: Call the Confessors to remove this mark.
TEXT.French: Call the Confessors to remove this mark.
TEXT.German: Ruft die Geistlichen. Sie sollen das Mal entfernen.
TEXT.Italian: Call the Confessors to remove this mark.
TEXT.Spanish: Call the Confessors to remove this mark.

TEXT.English: This child will be champion among men on the battlefield. Outfit him with the proper equipment and train him to lead our armies.
TEXT.French: This child will be champion among men on the battlefield. Outfit him with the proper equipment and train him to lead our armies.
TEXT.German: Dieses Kind wird allen Männern auf dem Schlachtfeld überlegen sein. Rüstet ihn entsprechend aus und bildet ihn zum Führer unserer Armeen aus.
TEXT.Italian: This child will be champion among men on the battlefield. Outfit him with the proper equipment and train him to lead our armies.
TEXT.Spanish: This child will be champion among men on the battlefield. Outfit him with the proper equipment and train him to lead our armies.

TEXT.English: Receives a Champion with Prophecy Mark
TEXT.French: Receives a Champion with Prophecy Mark
TEXT.German: Erhalte einen Champion mit dem Fluch der Vorhersehung
TEXT.Italian: Receives a Champion with Prophecy Mark
TEXT.Spanish: Receives a Champion with Prophecy Mark

TEXT.English: Teach the child he has free will and can forsake his destiny set by the gods.
TEXT.French: Teach the child he has free will and can forsake his destiny set by the gods.
TEXT.German: Erklärt dem Kind, dass es einen freien Willen hat und sich nicht um sein göttergegebenes Schicksal kümmern braucht.
TEXT.Italian: Teach the child he has free will and can forsake his destiny set by the gods.
TEXT.Spanish: Teach the child he has free will and can forsake his destiny set by the gods.

TEXT.English: Receives a Luonnotar
TEXT.French: Receives a Luonnotar
TEXT.German: Erhalte einen Luonnotar
TEXT.Italian: Receives a Luonnotar
TEXT.Spanish: Receives a Luonnotar

TEXT.English: Crazed citizens are celebrating the "Carnival of the Hanging Sisters" in %s2_city. They've raided local graveyards and strung up the dead like puppets!
TEXT.French: Crazed citizens are celebrating the "Carnival of the Hanging Sisters" in %s2_city. They've raided local graveyards and strung up the dead like puppets!
TEXT.German: Durchgeknallte Bürger feiern den "Karneval der Hängenden Schwestern" in %s2_city. Sie haben die örtlichen Friedhöfe geplündert und die Toten wie Puppen aufgehängt.
TEXT.Italian: Crazed citizens are celebrating the "Carnival of the Hanging Sisters" in %s2_city. They've raided local graveyards and strung up the dead like puppets!
TEXT.Spanish: Crazed citizens are celebrating the "Carnival of the Hanging Sisters" in %s2_city. They've raided local graveyards and strung up the dead like puppets!

TEXT.English: Let the carnival begin!
TEXT.French: Let the carnival begin!
TEXT.German: Lasst den Karneval beginnen!
TEXT.Italian: Let the carnival begin!
TEXT.Spanish: Let the carnival begin!

TEXT.English: MAKE IT STOP!
TEXT.French: MAKE IT STOP!
TEXT.German: Beendet es! Sofort!
TEXT.Italian: MAKE IT STOP!
TEXT.Spanish: MAKE IT STOP!

TEXT.English: A great idea!
TEXT.French: A great idea!
TEXT.German: Eine großartige Idee!
TEXT.Italian: A great idea!
TEXT.Spanish: A great idea!

TEXT.English: People are coughing up ashes and fire in %s2_city. The reason is unknown.
TEXT.French: People are coughing up ashes and fire in %s2_city. The reason is unknown.
TEXT.German: Die Bewohner von %s2_city husten Asche und Feuer. Es ist kein Grund bekannt.
TEXT.Italian: People are coughing up ashes and fire in %s2_city. The reason is unknown.
TEXT.Spanish: People are coughing up ashes and fire in %s2_city. The reason is unknown.

TEXT.English: Kill all of the fire breathers, just to be sure.
TEXT.French: Kill all of the fire breathers, just to be sure.
TEXT.German: Tötet alle, die Feuer atmen, nur um sicher zu gehen.
TEXT.Italian: Kill all of the fire breathers, just to be sure.
TEXT.Spanish: Kill all of the fire breathers, just to be sure.

TEXT.English: This is an omen. All hail the dragon!
TEXT.French: This is an omen. All hail the dragon!
TEXT.German: Das ist ein Omen. Heil dem Drachen!
TEXT.Italian: This is an omen. All hail the dragon!
TEXT.Spanish: This is an omen. All hail the dragon!

TEXT.English: Purge the evil from our people.
TEXT.French: Purge the evil from our people.
TEXT.German: Treibt das Büse aus unseren Leuten aus.
TEXT.Italian: Purge the evil from our people.
TEXT.Spanish: Purge the evil from our people.

TEXT.English: Have our mages investigate this matter.
TEXT.French: Have our mages investigate this matter.
TEXT.German: Unsere Magier sollen sich damit befassen.
TEXT.Italian: Have our mages investigate this matter.
TEXT.Spanish: Have our mages investigate this matter.

TEXT.English: 50%:Receives an Adept with Fire I and Entropy I[NEWLINE]50%: Temporary Unhappiness
TEXT.French: 50%:Receives an Adept with Fire I and Entropy I[NEWLINE]50%: Temporary Unhappiness
TEXT.German: 50%: Erhalte einen Adepten mit 'Feuer I' und 'Entropie I'[NEWLINE]50%: Vrübergehende Unzufriedenheit
TEXT.Italian: 50%:Receives an Adept with Fire I and Entropy I[NEWLINE]50%: Temporary Unhappiness
TEXT.Spanish: 50%:Receives an Adept with Fire I and Entropy I[NEWLINE]50%: Temporary Unhappiness

TEXT.English: An angel's body was found sliced open in the fields. Plants around it are dying off.
TEXT.French: An angel's body was found sliced open in the fields. Plants around it are dying off.
TEXT.German: Der Körper eines Engels wurde zerstückelt in den Felder gefunden. Die Pflanzen in der näheren Umgebung sterben ab.
TEXT.Italian: An angel's body was found sliced open in the fields. Plants around it are dying off.
TEXT.Spanish: An angel's body was found sliced open in the fields. Plants around it are dying off.

TEXT.English: Sanctify the area.
TEXT.French: Sanctify the area.
TEXT.German: Erklärt den Ort zu einem Heiligtum.
TEXT.Italian: Sanctify the area.
TEXT.Spanish: Sanctify the area.

TEXT.English: Ensure the angel gets a proper burial.
TEXT.French: Ensure the angel gets a proper burial.
TEXT.German: Sorgt dafür, dass der Engel ein angemessenes Begräbnis erhält.
TEXT.Italian: Ensure the angel gets a proper burial.
TEXT.Spanish: Ensure the angel gets a proper burial.

TEXT.English: Leave the body to rot.
TEXT.French: Leave the body to rot.
TEXT.German: Lasst den Körper einfach verrotten.
TEXT.Italian: Leave the body to rot.
TEXT.Spanish: Leave the body to rot.

TEXT.English: Do our very best to defile the lands further.
TEXT.French: Do our very best to defile the lands further.
TEXT.German: Tut euer Bestes, um die Gegend noch weiter zu besudeln.
TEXT.Italian: Do our very best to defile the lands further.
TEXT.Spanish: Do our very best to defile the lands further.

TEXT.English: Changes the plot to Hell
TEXT.French: Changes the plot to Hell
TEXT.German: Erschafft 'Höllengebiet' auf dem Feld
TEXT.Italian: Changes the plot to Hell
TEXT.Spanish: Changes the plot to Hell

TEXT.English: Hmm... send our necromancers!
TEXT.French: Mhm... Envoyez nos nécromanciens !
TEXT.German: Hmm... Schickt unsere Nekromanten!
TEXT.Italian: Hmm... send our necromancers!
TEXT.Spanish: Hmm... send our necromancers!

TEXT.English: Receives an Angel with Undead and Plague Carrier
TEXT.French: Receives an Angel with Undead and Plague Carrier
TEXT.German: Erhalte einen Engel mit 'Untot' und 'Seuchenherd'
TEXT.Italian: Receives an Angel with Undead and Plague Carrier
TEXT.Spanish: Receives an Angel with Undead and Plague Carrier

TEXT.English: A depressed toymaker is making tiny coffins for dolls. Their popularity is causing unease among the citizens.
TEXT.French: A depressed toymaker is making tiny coffins for dolls. Their popularity is causing unease among the citizens.
TEXT.German: Ein deprimierter Spielzeugmacher stellt winzige Särge für Puppen her. Deren Beliebtheit erzeugt eine unangenehme Stimmung unter Euren Bürgern.
TEXT.Italian: A depressed toymaker is making tiny coffins for dolls. Their popularity is causing unease among the citizens.
TEXT.Spanish: A depressed toymaker is making tiny coffins for dolls. Their popularity is causing unease among the citizens.

TEXT.English: Stop the toymaker, and get these things out of my sight. They make me sick.
TEXT.French: Stop the toymaker, and get these things out of my sight. They make me sick.
TEXT.German: Stoppt den Spielzeugmacher und schafft mir diese Dinger aus den Augen. Sie machen mich krank!
TEXT.Italian: Stop the toymaker, and get these things out of my sight. They make me sick.
TEXT.Spanish: Stop the toymaker, and get these things out of my sight. They make me sick.

TEXT.English: I don't care what this toymaker does.
TEXT.French: I don't care what this toymaker does.
TEXT.German: Ist mir doch egal, was dieser Spielzeugmacher tut.
TEXT.Italian: I don't care what this toymaker does.
TEXT.Spanish: I don't care what this toymaker does.

TEXT.English: Make tiny Kuriotates dolls to fit these coffins.
TEXT.French: Make tiny Kuriotates dolls to fit these coffins.
TEXT.German: Macht winzige Puppen von den Kuriotaten, die in diese Särge passen.
TEXT.Italian: Make tiny Kuriotates dolls to fit these coffins.
TEXT.Spanish: Make tiny Kuriotates dolls to fit these coffins.

TEXT.English: They're beautiful! Toymakers should carve these baby coffins in all our cities!
TEXT.French: They're beautiful! Toymakers should carve these baby coffins in all our cities!
TEXT.German: Sie sind wunderschön! Spielzeugmacher sollten diese Särge in allen Städten herstellen!
TEXT.Italian: They're beautiful! Toymakers should carve these baby coffins in all our cities!
TEXT.Spanish: They're beautiful! Toymakers should carve these baby coffins in all our cities!

TEXT.English: A devastating plague has hit %s2_city. Peoples' limbs are rotting black and falling off. Prophets on the streets say it's a sign of the end of times.
TEXT.French: A devastating plague has hit %s2_city. Peoples' limbs are rotting black and falling off. Prophets on the streets say it's a sign of the end of times.
TEXT.German: Eine herhehrende Seuche hat %s2_city erreicht. Die Glieder der Bewohner verfaulen zu schwarzen Stümpfen und fallen ab. Propheten erklären in den Straßen, dass dies ein Anzeichen für das Ende aller Tage sei.
TEXT.Italian: A devastating plague has hit %s2_city. Peoples' limbs are rotting black and falling off. Prophets on the streets say it's a sign of the end of times.
TEXT.Spanish: A devastating plague has hit %s2_city. Peoples' limbs are rotting black and falling off. Prophets on the streets say it's a sign of the end of times.

TEXT.English: Tell the city doctor's to do everything they can.
TEXT.French: Tell the city doctor's to do everything they can.
TEXT.German: Sagt den Ärzten der Stadt, sie sollen alles in ihrer Macht stehende unternehmen.
TEXT.Italian: Tell the city doctor's to do everything they can.
TEXT.Spanish: Tell the city doctor's to do everything they can.

TEXT.English: Halves City Population[NEWLINE]Units in the City gains Plagued
TEXT.French: Halves City Population[NEWLINE]Units in the City gains Plagued
TEXT.German: Halbiert die Bevölkerung der Stadt[NEWLINE]Einheiten der Stadt erhalten die Beförderung 'Verseucht'
TEXT.Italian: Halves City Population[NEWLINE]Units in the City gains Plagued
TEXT.Spanish: Halves City Population[NEWLINE]Units in the City gains Plagued

TEXT.English: Our people won't suffer for the pointless conflicts of the divine. Send our medics in to stamp out this pandemic.
TEXT.French: Our people won't suffer for the pointless conflicts of the divine. Send our medics in to stamp out this pandemic.
TEXT.German: Unser Volk wird sicher nicht wegen diesen sinnlosen Konflikts der Göttlichen zu leiden haben. Schickt unsere Ärzte. Sie sollen diese Pandämie ausmerzen.
TEXT.Italian: Our people won't suffer for the pointless conflicts of the divine. Send our medics in to stamp out this pandemic..
TEXT.Spanish: Our people won't suffer for the pointless conflicts of the divine. Send our medics in to stamp out this pandemic.

TEXT.English: Burn the homes of the infected and quarantine the city.
TEXT.French: Burn the homes of the infected and quarantine the city.
TEXT.German: Verbrennt die Häser der Infizierten und stellt die Stadt unter Quarantäne.
TEXT.Italian: Burn the homes of the infected and quarantine the city.
TEXT.Spanish: Burn the homes of the infected and quarantine the city.

TEXT.English: Bring the corpses here, we'll put them to good use.
TEXT.French: Bring the corpses here, we'll put them to good use.
TEXT.German: Bringt die Leichen, wir werden schon eine nützliche Verwendung für sie finden.
TEXT.Italian: Bring the corpses here, we'll put them to good use.
TEXT.Spanish: Bring the corpses here, we'll put them to good use.

TEXT.English: Halves City Population[NEWLINE]Receives 1 Diseased Corpse for each two population lost
TEXT.French: Halves City Population[NEWLINE]Receives 1 Diseased Corpse for each two population lost
TEXT.German: Halbiert die Bevölkerung der Stadt[NEWLINE]Erhalte 1 Versuchte Leiche je 2 verlorenen Bevölkerungspunkten
TEXT.Italian: Halves City Population[NEWLINE]Receives 1 Diseased Corpse for each two population lost
TEXT.Spanish: Halves City Population[NEWLINE]Receives 1 Diseased Corpse for each two population lost

TEXT.English: People are committing suicide in droves in %s2_city.
TEXT.French: People are committing suicide in droves in %s2_city.
TEXT.German: Unsere Leute in %s2_city begehen massenhaft Selbstmord!
TEXT.Italian: People are committing suicide in droves in %s2_city.
TEXT.Spanish: People are committing suicide in droves in %s2_city.

TEXT.English: Tell our Spirit adepts to do whatever they can to calm them.
TEXT.French: Tell our Spirit adepts to do whatever they can to calm them.
TEXT.German: Sagt unseren 'Seele'-Adepten, sie sollen alles in ihrer Macht stehende unternehmen, um sie zu beruhigen.
TEXT.Italian: Tell our Spirit adepts to do whatever they can to calm them.
TEXT.Spanish: Tell our Spirit adepts to do whatever they can to calm them.

TEXT.English: Send in councilors to talk to the people. Find out what troubles them and put an end to it.
TEXT.French: Send in councilors to talk to the people. Find out what troubles them and put an end to it.
TEXT.German: Schickt die Stadträte, um mit ihnen zu reden. Sie sollen herausfinden, was das Problem ist und es beenden.
TEXT.Italian: Send in councilors to talk to the people. Find out what troubles them and put an end to it.
TEXT.Spanish: Send in councilors to talk to the people. Find out what troubles them and put an end to it.

TEXT.English: There is little we can do. Strengthen the local guard and do whatever we can to stop the suicides.
TEXT.French: There is little we can do. Strengthen the local guard and do whatever we can to stop the suicides.
TEXT.German: Das kann man nichts machen. Verstärkt die örtlichen Wachen und versucht, alles zu tun, um die Selbstmorde zu stoppen.
TEXT.Italian: There is little we can do. Strengthen the local guard and do whatever we can to stop the suicides.
TEXT.Spanish: There is little we can do. Strengthen the local guard and do whatever we can to stop the suicides.

TEXT.English: Let them die if they wish to. Free Will, right?
TEXT.French: Let them die if they wish to. Free Will, right?
TEXT.German: Lasst sie sterben, wenn sie das wollen. Freier Wille, oder?
TEXT.Italian: Let them die if they wish to. Free Will, right?
TEXT.Spanish: Let them die if they wish to. Free Will, right?

TEXT.English: Where do they think they will go?
TEXT.French: Where do they think they will go?
TEXT.German: Was glauben sie, wohin sie gehen werden?
TEXT.Italian: Where do they think they will go?
TEXT.Spanish: Where do they think they will go?

TEXT.English: Receives 3 Manes
TEXT.French: Receives 3 Manes
TEXT.German: Erhalte 3 Manen
TEXT.Italian: Receives 3 Manes
TEXT.Spanish: Receives 3 Manes

TEXT.English: People in %s2_city are eating their dead.
TEXT.French: People in %s2_city are eating their dead.
TEXT.German: Die Leute in %s2_city essen ihre Toten.
TEXT.Italian: People in %s2_city are eating their dead.
TEXT.Spanish: People in %s2_city are eating their dead.

TEXT.English: If they really want to do it...
TEXT.French: If they really want to do it...
TEXT.German: Wenn sie es nun mal tun wollen...
TEXT.Italian: If they really want to do it...
TEXT.Spanish: If they really want to do it...

TEXT.English: Conscript as many as you can.
TEXT.French: Conscript as many as you can.
TEXT.German: Rekrutiert soviele von ihnen, wie ihr könnt.
TEXT.Italian: Conscript as many as you can.
TEXT.Spanish: Conscript as many as you can.

TEXT.English: Halves City Population[NEWLINE]Receives 1 Warrior with Cannibalize for each two population lost
TEXT.French: Halves City Population[NEWLINE]Receives 1 Warrior with Cannibalize for each two population lost
TEXT.German: Halbiert die Stadtbevölkerung[NEWLINE]Erhalte 1 Krieger mit 'Kannibalismus' für je 2 verlorene Bevölkerung
TEXT.Italian: Halves City Population[NEWLINE]Receives 1 Warrior with Cannibalize for each two population lost
TEXT.Spanish: Halves City Population[NEWLINE]Receives 1 Warrior with Cannibalize for each two population lost

TEXT.English: Put a stop to this.
TEXT.French: Put a stop to this.
TEXT.German: Macht dem ein Ende.
TEXT.Italian: Put a stop to this.
TEXT.Spanish: Put a stop to this.

TEXT.English: Have the dead fight back.
TEXT.French: Have the dead fight back.
TEXT.German: Lasst die Toten zurückschlagen.
TEXT.Italian: Have the dead fight back.
TEXT.Spanish: Have the dead fight back.

TEXT.English: Receives 2 Diseased Corpses
TEXT.French: Receives 2 Diseased Corpses
TEXT.German: Erhalte 2 Verseuchte Leichen
TEXT.Italian: Receives 2 Diseased Corpses
TEXT.Spanish: Receives 2 Diseased Corpses

TEXT.English: A portal to Hell has opened in one of your cities.
TEXT.French: A portal to Hell has opened in one of your cities.
TEXT.German: Ein Portal zur Hölle hat sich in einer unserer Städte geöffnet.
TEXT.Italian: A portal to Hell has opened in one of your cities.
TEXT.Spanish: A portal to Hell has opened in one of your cities.

TEXT.English: A mysterious ship has drifted into the harbor of %s2_city. It appears to be in good condition, but it flies the flag of no known nation, and its crew is nowhere to be seen. So far, no one has emerged from the ship, and the townsfolk have not dared to approach it, fearing that it may be cursed.
TEXT.French: A mysterious ship has drifted into the harbor of %s2_city. It appears to be in good condition, but it flies the flag of no known nation, and its crew is nowhere to be seen. So far, no one has emerged from the ship, and the townsfolk have not dared to approach it, fearing that it may be cursed.
TEXT.German: Ein geheimnisvolles Schiff treibt in den Hafen von %s2_city. Es scheint in guter Verfasssung zu sein, doch es führt die Fahne eines Euch nicht bekanntes Volkes und die Crew ist nirgends zu sehen. Bisher ist niemand von Bord gekommen und die Bevölkerung hat es nicht gewagt, sich dem Schiff zu nähern. Es könnte ja verflucht sein, oder?
TEXT.Italian: A mysterious ship has drifted into the harbor of %s2_city. It appears to be in good condition, but it flies the flag of no known nation, and its crew is nowhere to be seen. So far, no one has emerged from the ship, and the townsfolk have not dared to approach it, fearing that it may be cursed.
TEXT.Spanish: A mysterious ship has drifted into the harbor of %s2_city. It appears to be in good condition, but it flies the flag of no known nation, and its crew is nowhere to be seen. So far, no one has emerged from the ship, and the townsfolk have not dared to approach it, fearing that it may be cursed.

TEXT.English: They are superstitious cowards. Order them to board the ship and claim it for our own.
TEXT.French: They are superstitious cowards. Order them to board the ship and claim it for our own.
TEXT.German: Ach, diese abergläubigen Feiglinge. Befehlt ihnen, das Schiff zu entern und für uns in Besitz zu nehmen.
TEXT.Italian: They are superstitious cowards. Order them to board the ship and claim it for our own.
TEXT.Spanish: They are superstitious cowards. Order them to board the ship and claim it for our own.

TEXT.English: They are wise to be prudent. Scuttle the ship, so that whatever curse claimed its crew will not spread to the town.
TEXT.French: They are wise to be prudent. Scuttle the ship, so that whatever curse claimed its crew will not spread to the town.
TEXT.German: Sie tun gut daran, vorsichtig zu sein. Versenkt das Schiff, damit der Fluch, dem die Crew zum Opfer gefallen ist, sich nicht auf die Stadt ausbreitet.
TEXT.Italian: They are wise to be prudent. Scuttle the ship, so that whatever curse claimed its crew will not spread to the town.
TEXT.Spanish: They are wise to be prudent. Scuttle the ship, so that whatever curse claimed its crew will not spread to the town.

TEXT.English: The rotting remains of the crew emerge from below decks to defend their ship.
TEXT.French: The rotting remains of the crew emerge from below decks to defend their ship.
TEXT.German: Die verrottenden Überreste der Crew brechen aus den unteren Decks hervor, um ihr Schiff zu verteidigen.
TEXT.Italian: The rotting remains of the crew emerge from below decks to defend their ship.
TEXT.Spanish: The rotting remains of the crew emerge from below decks to defend their ship.

TEXT.English: The crew are found within the ship, dead of an unknown disease.
TEXT.French: The crew are found within the ship, dead of an unknown disease.
TEXT.German: Die Crew wurde im Inneren des Schiffs aufgefunden, tot durch eine unbekannte Krankheit.
TEXT.Italian: The crew are found within the ship, dead of an unknown disease.
TEXT.Spanish: The crew are found within the ship, dead of an unknown disease.

TEXT.English: A lone crewman is found hiding within the ship, incoherent and violently insane.
TEXT.French: A lone crewman is found hiding within the ship, incoherent and violently insane.
TEXT.German: Ein einzelnes Crewmitglied wurde in einem Versteck im Schiff aufgespürt. Er faselt unzusammenhängendes Zeug und ist eindeutig komplett verrückt.
TEXT.Italian: A lone crewman is found hiding within the ship, incoherent and violently insane.
TEXT.Spanish: A lone crewman is found hiding within the ship, incoherent and violently insane.

TEXT.English: The ship is deserted, but holds much valuable cargo.
TEXT.French: The ship is deserted, but holds much valuable cargo.
TEXT.German: Das Schiff ist verlassen, doch Ihr findet wertvolle Ladung.
TEXT.Italian: The ship is deserted, but holds much valuable cargo.
TEXT.Spanish: The ship is deserted, but holds much valuable cargo.

TEXT.English: As several townspeople board the ship, it shudders and sinks suddenly into the water, taking them with it.
TEXT.French: As several townspeople board the ship, it shudders and sinks suddenly into the water, taking them with it.
TEXT.German: Als einige der Leute aus der Stadt das Schiff betreten, erzittert es und versinkt in den Fluten. Und reißt sie mit sich.
TEXT.Italian: As several townspeople board the ship, it shudders and sinks suddenly into the water, taking them with it.
TEXT.Spanish: As several townspeople board the ship, it shudders and sinks suddenly into the water, taking them with it.

TEXT.English: A mysterious map is found in the captain's quarters.
TEXT.French: A mysterious map is found in the captain's quarters.
TEXT.German: Eine geheimnisvolle Karte wurde in der Kajüte des Kapitäns gefunden.
TEXT.Italian: A mysterious map is found in the captain's quarters.
TEXT.Spanish: A mysterious map is found in the captain's quarters.

TEXT.English: Orc Slaying
TEXT.French: Tueur d'Orcs
TEXT.German: Orkschlächter
TEXT.Italian: Orc Slaying
TEXT.Spanish: Orc Slaying

TEXT.English: After our troops defeated the goblin horde, a soldier discovered an orphaned Goblin child. Seeing that it posed no threat, he took pity on it and has been taking care of it.
TEXT.French: After our troops defeated the goblin horde, a soldier discovered an orphaned Goblin child. Seeing that it posed no threat, he took pity on it and has been taking care of it.
TEXT.German: Nachdem Eure Truppen die Goblinhorde besiegt hat, findet einer der Soldaten ein (nun) verwaistes Goblinkind. Da es offensichtlich keine Bedrohung darstellt, hat er Mitleid und kümmert sich um das kleine Ding.
TEXT.Italian: After our troops defeated the goblin horde, a soldier discovered an orphaned Goblin child. Seeing that it posed no threat, he took pity on it and has been taking care of it.
TEXT.Spanish: After our troops defeated the goblin horde, a soldier discovered an orphaned Goblin child. Seeing that it posed no threat, he took pity on it and has been taking care of it.

TEXT.English: Punish this weakness by having the soldier kill his new friend, see if the trauma teaches him a lesson.
TEXT.French: Punish this weakness by having the soldier kill his new friend, see if the trauma teaches him a lesson.
TEXT.German: Bestraft diesen gefühlsduseligen Soldaten mit dem Befehl, seinen neuen Freund zu töten. Wollen doch mal sehen, ob er daraus etwas lernt.
TEXT.Italian: Punish this weakness by having the soldier kill his new friend, see if the trauma teaches him a lesson.
TEXT.Spanish: Punish this weakness by having the soldier kill his new friend, see if the trauma teaches him a lesson.

TEXT.English: Unit gains Orc Slaying and Crazed
TEXT.French: Unit gains Orc Slaying and Crazed
TEXT.German: Einheit erhält 'Orkschlächter' und 'Wahnsinn'
TEXT.Italian: Unit gains Orc Slaying and Crazed
TEXT.Spanish: Unit gains Orc Slaying and Crazed

TEXT.English: Such compassion is noble, allow him to raise the child to follow in his footsteps.
TEXT.French: Such compassion is noble, allow him to raise the child to follow in his footsteps.
TEXT.German: Solche Anteilnahme ist wirklich edel, erlaubt ihm, das Kind großzuziehen. Es soll einmal in seine Fußstapfen treten.
TEXT.Italian: Such compassion is noble, allow him to raise the child to follow in his footsteps.
TEXT.Spanish: Such compassion is noble, allow him to raise the child to follow in his footsteps.

TEXT.English: Unit becomes of Goblin race
TEXT.French: L'unité obtient la race gobeline
TEXT.German: Einheit erhält die Rasse 'Goblin'
TEXT.Italian: Unit becomes of Goblin race
TEXT.Spanish: Unit becomes of Goblin race

TEXT.English: His actions were noble, but we cannot risk barbarians in our army. Abandon the child.
TEXT.French: His actions were noble, but we cannot risk barbarians in our army. Abandon the child.
TEXT.German: Sein Handeln war edel, doch wir können uns keine Barbaren in der Armee leisten. Setzt das Kind aus.
TEXT.Italian: His actions were noble, but we cannot risk barbarians in our army. Abandon the child.
TEXT.Spanish: His actions were noble, but we cannot risk barbarians in our army. Abandon the child.

TEXT.English: 50%: a Barbarian Weak Goblin spawns nearby[NEWLINE]50%: you Receive a Weak Goblin
TEXT.French: 50%: a Barbarian Weak Goblin spawns nearby[NEWLINE]50%: you Receive a Weak Goblin
TEXT.German: 50%: Ein schwacher Goblin erscheint in der Nähe[NEWLINE]50%: Ihr erhaltet einen schwachen Goblin
TEXT.Italian: 50%: a Barbarian Weak Goblin spawns nearby[NEWLINE]50%: you Receive a Weak Goblin
TEXT.Spanish: 50%: a Barbarian Weak Goblin spawns nearby[NEWLINE]50%: you Receive a Weak Goblin

TEXT.English: The army is no place to raise children! Allow the soldier to return home to raise his new child.
TEXT.French: The army is no place to raise children! Allow the soldier to return home to raise his new child.
TEXT.German: Die Armee ist kein Platz, um Kinder großzuziehen! Der Soldat soll nach Hause zurückkehren, um sein neues Kind zu aufziehen zu können.
TEXT.Italian: The army is no place to raise children! Allow the soldier to return home to raise his new child.
TEXT.Spanish: The army is no place to raise children! Allow the soldier to return home to raise his new child.

TEXT.English: Unit loses 1 EXP[NEWLINE]You Receive a Goblin
TEXT.French: Unit loses 1 EXP[NEWLINE]You Receive a Goblin
TEXT.German: Einheit verliert 1 EP[NEWLINE]Ihr erhaltet einen Goblin
TEXT.Italian: Unit loses 1 EXP[NEWLINE]You Receive a Goblin
TEXT.Spanish: Unit loses 1 EXP[NEWLINE]You Receive a Goblin

TEXT.English: You glare silently at your personal counsellor, watching fear flowing through his mind until he stammers "That... that was only a... joke, My Lord".[NEWLINE]On your signal, the guards grab the culprit and take him to the torture chambers.[NEWLINE]The (former) counsellor screams in pain for a whole week before his brain collapses. His body is now ready for manual labor.
TEXT.French: You glare silently at your personal counsellor, watching fear flowing through his mind until he stammers "That... that was only a... joke, My Lord".[NEWLINE]On your signal, the guards grab the culprit and take him to the torture chambers.[NEWLINE]The (former) counsellor screams in pain for a whole week before his brain collapses. His body is now ready for manual labor.
TEXT.German: You glare silently at your personal counsellor, watching fear flowing through his mind until he stammers "That... that was only a... joke, My Lord".[NEWLINE]On your signal, the guards grab the culprit and take him to the torture chambers.[NEWLINE]The (former) counsellor screams in pain for a whole week before his brain collapses. His body is now ready for manual labor.
TEXT.Italian: You glare silently at your personal counsellor, watching fear flowing through his mind until he stammers "That... that was only a... joke, My Lord".[NEWLINE]On your signal, the guards grab the culprit and take him to the torture chambers.[NEWLINE]The (former) counsellor screams in pain for a whole week before his brain collapses. His body is now ready for manual labor.
TEXT.Spanish: You glare silently at your personal counsellor, watching fear flowing through his mind until he stammers "That... that was only a... joke, My Lord".[NEWLINE]On your signal, the guards grab the culprit and take him to the torture chambers.[NEWLINE]The (former) counsellor screams in pain for a whole week before his brain collapses. His body is now ready for manual labor.

TEXT.English: Counsellor's body
TEXT.French: Cadavre du conseiller
TEXT.German: Counsellor's body
TEXT.Italian: Counsellor's body
TEXT.Spanish: Counsellor's body

TEXT.English: You receive a slave.
TEXT.French: Vous obtenez un esclave.
TEXT.German: You receive a slave.
TEXT.Italian: You receive a slave.
TEXT.Spanish: You receive a slave.

TEXT.English: The barbarian hordes are at our gates! Our armies have failed us! We are doomed!
TEXT.French: The barbarian hordes are at our gates! Our armies have failed us! We are doomed!
TEXT.German: Barbarische Horden stehen vor unseren Toren! Unsere Armeen haben uns im Stich gelassen! Wir sind verloren!
TEXT.Italian: The barbarian hordes are at our gates! Our armies have failed us! We are doomed!
TEXT.Spanish: The barbarian hordes are at our gates! Our armies have failed us! We are doomed!

TEXT.English: Conscript the populace. Even if there are massive casualties, our empire must survive.
TEXT.French: Conscript the populace. Even if there are massive casualties, our empire must survive.
TEXT.German: Rekrutiert die Bevölkerung. Auch wenn der Preis massive Verluste sein sollte, unser Reich darf nicht untergehen!
TEXT.Italian: Conscript the populace. Even if there are massive casualties, our empire must survive.
TEXT.Spanish: Conscript the populace. Even if there are massive casualties, our empire must survive.

TEXT.English: City's population is reduced to 1[NEWLINE]The Barbarian troops leave
TEXT.French: City's population is reduced to 1[NEWLINE]The Barbarian troops leave
TEXT.German: Bevölkerung wird auf 1 reduziert[NEWLINE]Die Barbaren ziehen ab
TEXT.Italian: City's population is reduced to 1[NEWLINE]The Barbarian troops leave
TEXT.Spanish: City's population is reduced to 1[NEWLINE]The Barbarian troops leave

TEXT.English: Announce our surrender, give them whatever they want.
TEXT.French: Announce our surrender, give them whatever they want.
TEXT.German: Nehmt Verhandlungen auf und gebt ihnen, was sie wollen.
TEXT.Italian: Announce our surrender, give them whatever they want.
TEXT.Spanish: Announce our surrender, give them whatever they want.

TEXT.English: City loses its current production[NEWLINE]The Barbarian troops leave
TEXT.French: City loses its current production[NEWLINE]The Barbarian troops leave
TEXT.German: Die Stadt verliert ihre komplette Produktion[NEWLINE]Die Barbaren ziehen ab
TEXT.Italian: City loses its current production[NEWLINE]The Barbarian troops leave
TEXT.Spanish: City loses its current production[NEWLINE]The Barbarian troops leave

TEXT.English: Sir? Where are you Sir? Our leader has abandoned us in our time of need! We are undone!
TEXT.French: Sir? Where are you Sir? Our leader has abandoned us in our time of need! We are undone!
TEXT.German: Herr? Wo seid ihr, Herr? Unser Führer hat uns in dieser Notlage im Stich gelassen! Wir sind schutzlos!
TEXT.Italian: Sir? Where are you Sir? Our leader has abandoned us in our time of need! We are undone!
