TEXT.Italian: A group of cultists in an Ancient Tower have summoned a Demon from Hell. Fortunately a band of adventurers killed the cultists and trapped the demon in the Tower.
TEXT.Spanish: A group of cultists in an Ancient Tower have summoned a Demon from Hell. Fortunately a band of adventurers killed the cultists and trapped the demon in the Tower.

TEXT.English: Let no one enter the Ancient Tower until we can kill or banish it.
TEXT.French: Let no one enter the Ancient Tower until we can kill or banish it.
TEXT.German: Niemand darf den Turm betreten, bis wir diesen Dämon nicht getötet oder gebannt haben.
TEXT.Italian: Let no one enter the Ancient Tower until we can kill or banish it.
TEXT.Spanish: Let no one enter the Ancient Tower until we can kill or banish it.

TEXT.English: A weakened (-60% strength) and immobile demon appears in the tower.
TEXT.French: A weakened (-60% strength) and immobile demon appears in the tower.
TEXT.German: Ein geschwächter (-60% Stärke) und unbeweglicher Dämon erscheint im Turm.
TEXT.Italian: A weakened (-60% strength) and immobile demon appears in the tower.
TEXT.Spanish: A weakened (-60% strength) and immobile demon appears in the tower.

TEXT.English: We have discovered a cache of pre-Age of Ice books in an Ancient Tower. The books are decorated with gold and jewels, but fragile - reading them may end up destroying them. And they may be dangerous to read. What shall we do?
TEXT.French: We have discovered a cache of pre-Age of Ice books in an Ancient Tower. The books are decorated with gold and jewels, but fragile - reading them may end up destroying them. And they may be dangerous to read. What shall we do?
TEXT.German: Wir haben ein verborgenes Lager mit Büchern aus einer Zeit vor dem Zeitalter des Eises in einem urlaten Turm gefunden. Die Bücher sind mit Gold und Juwelen verziert, jedoch sind die Verzierungen sehr empfindlich - das Lesen könnte mit ihrem Verlust enden. Und das Lesen ist eventuell gefährlich. Was sollen wir tun?
TEXT.Italian: We have discovered a cache of pre-Age of Ice books in an Ancient Tower. The books are decorated with gold and jewels, but fragile - reading them may end up destroying them. And they may be dangerous to read. What shall we do?
TEXT.Spanish: We have discovered a cache of pre-Age of Ice books in an Ancient Tower. The books are decorated with gold and jewels, but fragile - reading them may end up destroying them. And they may be dangerous to read. What shall we do?

TEXT.English: Have them sent - carefully - to our scholars for study.
TEXT.French: Have them sent - carefully - to our scholars for study.
TEXT.German: Sendet sie - mit aller Vorsicht - zu unseren Gelehrten. Sie sollen sie studieren.
TEXT.Italian: Have them sent - carefully - to our scholars for study.
TEXT.Spanish: Have them sent - carefully - to our scholars for study.

TEXT.English: Have them sent - carefully - to our priests and mystics for study.
TEXT.French: Have them sent - carefully - to our priests and mystics for study.
TEXT.German: Schickt sie - mit aller Vorsicht - unseren Priestern und Mystikern. Sie sollen sie studieren.
TEXT.Italian: Have them sent - carefully - to our priests and mystics for study.
TEXT.Spanish: Have them sent - carefully - to our priests and mystics for study.

TEXT.English: Keep the gold and jewels, but burn the books just to be safe.
TEXT.French: Keep the gold and jewels, but burn the books just to be safe.
TEXT.German: Behaltet das Gold und die Juwelen. Verbrennt die Bücher, nur für alle Fälle.
TEXT.Italian: Keep the gold and jewels, but burn the books just to be safe.
TEXT.Spanish: Keep the gold and jewels, but burn the books just to be safe.

TEXT.English: A sudden storm caught a number of our %s3_unit by surprise. They were all sunk or damaged beyond repair.
TEXT.French: A sudden storm caught a number of our %s3_unit by surprise. They were all sunk or damaged beyond repair.
TEXT.German: Ein plötzlicher Sturm hat einige unserer %s3_unit überrascht. Sie sind gesunken oder so zerstört, dass eine Reparatur nicht möglich ist.
TEXT.Italian: A sudden storm caught a number of our %s3_unit by surprise. They were all sunk or damaged beyond repair.
TEXT.Spanish: A sudden storm caught a number of our %s3_unit by surprise. They were all sunk or damaged beyond repair.

TEXT.English: As it is said, anyone can steer a ship when the sea is calm.
TEXT.French: As it is said, anyone can steer a ship when the sea is calm.
TEXT.German: Man sagt, dass jeder ein Schiff steuern kann, wenn die See ruhig ist.
TEXT.Italian: As it is said, anyone can steer a ship when the sea is calm.
TEXT.Spanish: As it is said, anyone can steer a ship when the sea is calm.

TEXT.English: Packs of wolves near the city of %s2_city have fed well on the local sheep flocks and grown very large and aggressive.
TEXT.French: Packs of wolves near the city of %s2_city have fed well on the local sheep flocks and grown very large and aggressive.
TEXT.German: Nahe der Stadt %s2_city haben sich Wolfsrudel an den örtlichen Schafsherden sattgefressen und sind groß und aggressiv geworden.
TEXT.Italian: Packs of wolves near the city of %s2_city have fed well on the local sheep flocks and grown very large and aggressive.
TEXT.Spanish: Packs of wolves near the city of %s2_city have fed well on the local sheep flocks and grown very large and aggressive.

TEXT.English: Those who cried wolf were telling the truth this time, I see.
TEXT.French: Those who cried wolf were telling the truth this time, I see.
TEXT.German: Diejenigen, die 'Wolf' gerufen hatten, scheinen diesmal Recht gehabt zu haben.
TEXT.Italian: Those who cried wolf were telling the truth this time, I see.
TEXT.Spanish: Those who cried wolf were telling the truth this time, I see.

TEXT.English: Kill the pack leaders - then they shall be our pack of wolves.
TEXT.French: Kill the pack leaders - then they shall be our pack of wolves.
TEXT.German: Tötet die Alphatiere - dann sollten wir die die Wülfe unter unsere Kontrolle bekommen.
TEXT.Italian: Kill the pack leaders - then they shall be our pack of wolves.
TEXT.Spanish: Kill the pack leaders - then they shall be our pack of wolves.

TEXT.English: Hire some adventurers to deal with them.
TEXT.French: Hire some adventurers to deal with them.
TEXT.German: Heuert einige Abenteurer an, die sich um sie kümmern.
TEXT.Italian: Hire some adventurers to deal with them.
TEXT.Spanish: Hire some adventurers to deal with them.

TEXT.English: An immobile barbarian Wolf Pack appears.
TEXT.French: An immobile barbarian Wolf Pack appears.
TEXT.German: Ein unbewegliches Wolfsrudel erscheint.
TEXT.Italian: An immobile barbarian Wolf Pack appears.
TEXT.Spanish: An immobile barbarian Wolf Pack appears.

TEXT.English: Ships of the Lanun have arrived in our waters, seeking gold and plunder!
TEXT.French: Ships of the Lanun have arrived in our waters, seeking gold and plunder!
TEXT.German: Schiffe der Lanun sind in unseren Gewässern aufgetaucht. Sie wollen plündern! Sie wollen unser Gold!
TEXT.Italian: Ships of the Lanun have arrived in our waters, seeking gold and plunder!
TEXT.Spanish: Ships of the Lanun have arrived in our waters, seeking gold and plunder!

TEXT.English: We must marshal our fleets to defeat these Lanun raiders.
TEXT.French: We must marshal our fleets to defeat these Lanun raiders.
TEXT.German: Entsendet unsere Flotte, um diese Lanunischen Räuber zu besiegen.
TEXT.Italian: We must marshal our fleets to defeat these Lanun raiders.
TEXT.Spanish: We must marshal our fleets to defeat these Lanun raiders.

TEXT.English: Ships of the %s1_civ_adjective Empire have come under attack from [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lanun Raiders[COLOR_REVERT]!
TEXT.French: Les bateaux de l'empire de %s1_civ_adjective ont relevé de l'attaque des corsaires!
TEXT.German: Schiffe des %s1_civ_adjective Reiches sind unter Angriff von den Seeräubern gekommen!
TEXT.Italian: Le navi dell'impero di %s1_civ_adjective sono rientrato nell'attacco dai corsairs!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Las naves del imperio de %s1_civ_adjective han venido bajo ataque de los corsairs!

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]A dangerous number of so-called [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lanun Privateer[COLOR_REVERT] units have gathered near our waters.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Un nombre dangereux des [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateer[COLOR_REVERT] barbares est apparu de notre eaux.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Eine gefährliche Anzahl von barbarischen [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Freibeutern[COLOR_REVERT] haben sich nahe unserer Gewässer gesammelt.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Ai nostri confini c'è un pericoloso numero di [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateer[COLOR_REVERT] barbari.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Un número peligroso de unidades bárbaras de la [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateer[COLOR_REVERT] ha frezado cerca de nuestras aguas.

TEXT.English: A tribe of centaurs has claimed the local herds of horses and the land they graze on for their tribe solely. The centaurs ask only to be left alone.
TEXT.French: A tribe of centaurs has claimed the local herds of horses and the land they graze on for their tribe solely. The centaurs ask only to be left alone.
TEXT.German: Ein Zentaurenstamm hat Anspruch auf die örtlichen Pferdeherden und das Land, auf dem sie weiden, erhoben. Die Zentauren verlangen, dass sie in Frieden leben können.
TEXT.Italian: A tribe of centaurs has claimed the local herds of horses and the land they graze on for their tribe solely. The centaurs ask only to be left alone.
TEXT.Spanish: A tribe of centaurs has claimed the local herds of horses and the land they graze on for their tribe solely. The centaurs ask only to be left alone.

TEXT.English: No, we claim that land.
TEXT.French: No, we claim that land.
TEXT.German: Nein, das Land gehört uns!
TEXT.Italian: No, we claim that land.
TEXT.Spanish: No, we claim that land.

TEXT.English: We will gladly let them manage the land there. In return we offer them protection and a place in our civilization.
TEXT.French: We will gladly let them manage the land there. In return we offer them protection and a place in our civilization.
TEXT.German: Wir werden ihnen diesen Land gern zur Verwaltung überlassen. Als Gegenleistung bieten wir ihnen Schutz und ein Refugium für ihre Zivilisation.
TEXT.Italian: We will gladly let them manage the land there. In return we offer them protection and a place in our civilization.
TEXT.Spanish: We will gladly let them manage the land there. In return we offer them protection and a place in our civilization.

TEXT.English: We welcome all who seek help not from heaven but from themselves, and offer them our friendship.
TEXT.French: We welcome all who seek help not from heaven but from themselves, and offer them our friendship.
TEXT.German: Wir heißen alle willkommen, die unsere Hilfe beanspruchen und bieten ihnen unsere Freundschaft an.
TEXT.Italian: We welcome all who seek help not from heaven but from themselves, and offer them our friendship.
TEXT.Spanish: We welcome all who seek help not from heaven but from themselves, and offer them our friendship.

TEXT.English: If they will manage the herds for us, we will extend them our protection.
TEXT.French: If they will manage the herds for us, we will extend them our protection.
TEXT.German: Wenn sie die Herden für uns betreuen, werden wir sie unter unseren Schutz stellen.
TEXT.Italian: If they will manage the herds for us, we will extend them our protection.
TEXT.Spanish: If they will manage the herds for us, we will extend them our protection.

TEXT.English: An immobile barbarian Centaur Archer appears.
TEXT.French: An immobile barbarian Centaur Archer appears.
TEXT.German: Ein unbeweglicher Zentaurenbogenschütze erscheint.
TEXT.Italian: An immobile barbarian Centaur Archer appears.
TEXT.Spanish: An immobile barbarian Centaur Archer appears.

TEXT.English: The sea life is so bountiful off our coasts that a pod of sea serpents has made one of our most productive fishing areas their personal larder.
TEXT.French: The sea life is so bountiful off our coasts that a pod of sea serpents has made one of our most productive fishing areas their personal larder.
TEXT.German: Die Seefauna vor unseren Küsten ist so reichhaltig, dass eine Gruppe von Seeschlangen einen unserer produktivsten Fischgründe zu ihrer persönlichen Speisekammer erklärt haben.
TEXT.Italian: The sea life is so bountiful off our coasts that a pod of sea serpents has made one of our most productive fishing areas their personal larder.
TEXT.Spanish: The sea life is so bountiful off our coasts that a pod of sea serpents has made one of our most productive fishing areas their personal larder.

TEXT.English: We will have to send our navy to deal with them.
TEXT.French: We will have to send our navy to deal with them.
TEXT.German: Wir werden unsere Flotte schicken, um mit ihnen fertig zu werden.
TEXT.Italian: We will have to send our navy to deal with them.
TEXT.Spanish: We will have to send our navy to deal with them.

TEXT.English: An immobile Sea Serpent appears on the plot.
TEXT.French: An immobile Sea Serpent appears on the plot.
TEXT.German: Eine unbewegliche Seeschlange erscheint auf dem Feld.
TEXT.Italian: An immobile Sea Serpent appears on the plot.
TEXT.Spanish: An immobile Sea Serpent appears on the plot.

TEXT.English: A motley collection of monkeys, apes, and gorillas has descended upon our banana crops, eating everything in sight.
TEXT.French: A motley collection of monkeys, apes, and gorillas has descended upon our banana crops, eating everything in sight.
TEXT.German: Eine zusammengewürfelte Mischung aus Affen, Menschenaffen und Gorillas has sich auch unseren Bananenplantagen niedergelassen und verschlingt alles, was sie zu Gesicht bekommt.
TEXT.Italian: A motley collection of monkeys, apes, and gorillas has descended upon our banana crops, eating everything in sight.
TEXT.Spanish: A motley collection of monkeys, apes, and gorillas has descended upon our banana crops, eating everything in sight.

TEXT.English: Monkey see, monkey do, as the old saying goes.
TEXT.French: Monkey see, monkey do, as the old saying goes.
TEXT.German: Affen! Das ist aber mal saublöd.
TEXT.Italian: Monkey see, monkey do, as the old saying goes.
TEXT.Spanish: Monkey see, monkey do, as the old saying goes.

TEXT.English: A Gorilla appears on the plot.
TEXT.French: A Gorilla appears on the plot.
TEXT.German: Ein Gorilla erscheint auf dem Feld.
TEXT.Italian: A Gorilla appears on the plot.
TEXT.Spanish: A Gorilla appears on the plot.

TEXT.English: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to catch their plentiful fish.
TEXT.French: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to catch their plentiful fish.
TEXT.German: Die Bürger unserer Siedlung von %s2_city haben auf eigene Faust eine kleine Fischerflotte zusammengestellt, um den reichlichen Fisch zu fangen.
TEXT.Italian: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to catch their plentiful fish.
TEXT.Spanish: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to catch their plentiful fish.

TEXT.English: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their bountiful clam beds.
TEXT.French: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their bountiful clam beds.
TEXT.German: Die Bürger unserer Siedlung von %s2_city haben auf eigene Faust eine kleine Fischerflotte zusammengestellt, um die reichlichen Muschelgründe abzuernten.
TEXT.Italian: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their bountiful clam beds.
TEXT.Spanish: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their bountiful clam beds.

TEXT.English: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their abundant crabs.
TEXT.French: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their abundant crabs.
TEXT.German: Die Bürger unserer Siedlung von %s2_city haben auf eigene Faust eine kleine Fischerflotte zusammengestellt, um die reichlichen Krabben zu fangen.
TEXT.Italian: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their abundant crabs.
TEXT.Spanish: The citizens of our settlement of %s2_city have constructed a small fishing fleet themselves to harvest their abundant crabs.

TEXT.English: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.French: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.German: Das ist die Art Bürgerinitiative, die ich mag.
TEXT.Italian: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.Spanish: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.

TEXT.English: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.French: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.German: Das ist die Art Bürgerinitiative, die ich mag.
TEXT.Italian: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.Spanish: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.

TEXT.English: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.French: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.German: Das ist die Art Bürgerinitiative, die ich mag.
TEXT.Italian: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.
TEXT.Spanish: That is the type of citizen initiative I like to hear about.

TEXT.English: Workers expanding the dungeons of a %s8_improvement near the city of %s2_city have disturbed the mass grave of a pre-Age of Ice battleground. They have fled in terror, saying the vengeful dead are rising.
TEXT.French: Workers expanding the dungeons of a %s8_improvement near the city of %s2_city have disturbed the mass grave of a pre-Age of Ice battleground. They have fled in terror, saying the vengeful dead are rising.
TEXT.German: Arbeiter, die die Stollen des Ausbaus %s8_improvement in der Nähe von %s2_city erweitern sollten, haben ein Massengrab auf einem Schlachtfeld aus der Zeit vor dem Zeitalter des Eises aufgespürt. Sie sind in Todesangst geflohen und behaupten, dass sich die rachsüchtigen Toten erheben.
TEXT.Italian: Workers expanding the dungeons of a %s8_improvement near the city of %s2_city have disturbed the mass grave of a pre-Age of Ice battleground. They have fled in terror, saying the vengeful dead are rising.
TEXT.Spanish: Workers expanding the dungeons of a %s8_improvement near the city of %s2_city have disturbed the mass grave of a pre-Age of Ice battleground. They have fled in terror, saying the vengeful dead are rising.

TEXT.English: If the dead are rising then they can rise into our armies.
TEXT.French: If the dead are rising then they can rise into our armies.
TEXT.German: Wenn sich die Toten erheben, dann können sie stehen. Wenn sie stehen, können sie auch kämpfen. Und dann am besten für uns!
TEXT.Italian: If the dead are rising then they can rise into our armies.
TEXT.Spanish: If the dead are rising then they can rise into our armies.

TEXT.English: Send some well-guarded Spirit adepts there and have them calm the restless spirits for good.
TEXT.French: Send some well-guarded Spirit adepts there and have them calm the restless spirits for good.
TEXT.German: Schickt gut bewachte Seelen-Adepten hin. Sie sollen den rastlosen Geister die ewige Ruhe bringen.
TEXT.Italian: Send some well-guarded Spirit adepts there and have them calm the restless spirits for good.
TEXT.Spanish: Send some well-guarded Spirit adepts there and have them calm the restless spirits for good.

TEXT.English: Send some well-guarded Life adepts there and have them Sanctify the ancient mass grave.
TEXT.French: Send some well-guarded Life adepts there and have them Sanctify the ancient mass grave.
TEXT.German: Schickt gut bewachte Leben-Adepten hin. Sie sollen das Massengrab weihen.
TEXT.Italian: Send some well-guarded Life adepts there and have them Sanctify the ancient mass grave.
TEXT.Spanish: Send some well-guarded Life adepts there and have them Sanctify the ancient mass grave.

TEXT.English: Keep everyone out of there until we destroy those risen spirits.
TEXT.French: Keep everyone out of there until we destroy those risen spirits.
TEXT.German: Haltet alle fern von dort. Bis wir die erhobenen Geister vernichtet haben.
TEXT.Italian: Keep everyone out of there until we destroy those risen spirits.
TEXT.Spanish: Keep everyone out of there until we destroy those risen spirits.

TEXT.English: An immobile barbarian Spectre appears.
TEXT.French: An immobile barbarian Spectre appears.
TEXT.German: Ein unbewegliches Phantom erscheint auf dem Feld.
TEXT.Italian: An immobile barbarian Spectre appears.
TEXT.Spanish: An immobile barbarian Spectre appears.

TEXT.English: Vengeful Dead
TEXT.French: Mort vindicatif
TEXT.German: Vengeful Dead
TEXT.Italian: Vengeful Dead
TEXT.Spanish: Vengeful Dead

TEXT.English: Muris Clan goblins are wandering in your lands,dumping their waste and poisoning the area.
TEXT.French: Des gobelins du Clan Muris rôdent sur vos terres, essaimant leurs ordures et empoisonnant la région.
TEXT.German: Muris Clan Goblins ziehen durch Eure Lande, sie hinterlassen ihren Unrat und verschmutzen die Gegend.
TEXT.Italian: Muris Clan goblins are wandering in your lands,dumping their waste and poisoning the area.
TEXT.Spanish: Muris Clan goblins are wandering in your lands,dumping their waste and poisoning the area.

TEXT.English: Chase Them!
TEXT.French: Pourchassez-les !
TEXT.German: Jagt sie!
TEXT.Italian: Chase Them!
TEXT.Spanish: Chase Them!

TEXT.English: Let them leave and Send an adept who is proficient in nature magic to heal the damage.
TEXT.French: Attendez qu'ils s'en aillent puis envoyez un adepte spécialisé en magie de la nature pour nettoyer tout ça.
TEXT.German: Lasst sie abziehen und schickt einen Adepten, der der Naturmagie mächtig ist. Er soll den Schaden beheben.
TEXT.Italian: Let them leave and Send an adept who is proficient in nature magic to heal the damage.
TEXT.Spanish: Let them leave and Send an adept who is proficient in nature magic to heal the damage.

TEXT.English: Muris Clan Wolf Rider
TEXT.French: Monteloup du Clan Muris
TEXT.German: Muris Clan Wolfsreiter
TEXT.Italian: Muris Clan Wolf Rider
TEXT.Spanish: Muris Clan Wolf Rider

TEXT.English: Muris Clan Goblin
TEXT.French: Éclaireur du Clan Muris
TEXT.German: Muris Clan Goblin
TEXT.Italian: Muris Clan Goblin
TEXT.Spanish: Muris Clan Goblin

TEXT.English: Muris Clan Archer
TEXT.French: Archer du Clan Muris
TEXT.German: Muris Clan Bogenschütze
TEXT.Italian: Muris Clan Archer
TEXT.Spanish: Muris Clan Archer

TEXT.English: Muris Clan Chariot
TEXT.French: Chariot du Clan Muris
TEXT.German: Muris Clan Chariot
TEXT.Italian: Muris Clan Chariot
TEXT.Spanish: Muris Clan Chariot

TEXT.English: Muris Clan Whelp
TEXT.French: Muris Clan Whelp
TEXT.German: Muris Clan Whelp
TEXT.Italian: Muris Clan Whelp
TEXT.Spanish: Muris Clan Whelp

TEXT.English: Muris Clan Wolf archer
TEXT.French: Archer monté du Clan Muris
TEXT.German: Muris Clan Wolf archer
TEXT.Italian: Muris Clan Wolf archer
TEXT.Spanish: Muris Clan Wolf archer

TEXT.English: Muris Clan Sapper
TEXT.French: Sapeur du Clan Muris
TEXT.German: Muris Clan Sapper
TEXT.Italian: Muris Clan Sapper
TEXT.Spanish: Muris Clan Sapper

TEXT.English: Muris Clan Lord
TEXT.French: Chef du Clan Muris
TEXT.German: Muris Clan Lord
TEXT.Italian: Muris Clan Lord
TEXT.Spanish: Muris Clan Lord

TEXT.English: While investigating about a few murders, our troops unveiled a new assassin guild. What must we do about it ?
TEXT.French: While investigating about a few murders, our troops unveiled a new assassin guild. What must we do about it ?
TEXT.German: Bei der Untersuchung von einigen Mordfällen enthüllt unsere Truppe eine neue Gilde von Meuchelmördern. Was soll mit ihr geschehen?
TEXT.Italian: While investigating about a few murders, our troops unveiled a new assassin guild. What must we do about it ?
TEXT.Spanish: While investigating about a few murders, our troops unveiled a new assassin guild. What must we do about it ?

TEXT.English: Shut It Down!
TEXT.French: Shut It Down!
TEXT.German: Schließt sie! Umgehend!
TEXT.Italian: Shut It Down!
TEXT.Spanish: Shut It Down!

TEXT.English: Spawns a Barb Assassin near the city
TEXT.French: Spawns a Barb Assassin near the city
TEXT.German: Erzeugt einen Barbarischen Meuchelmörder in der Nähe der Stadt
TEXT.Italian: Spawns a Barb Assassin near the city
TEXT.Spanish: Spawns a Barb Assassin near the city

TEXT.English: Let them do whatever they want ... but tax it.
TEXT.French: Let them do whatever they want ... but tax it.
TEXT.German: Sie sollen machen, was sie wollen ... doch Steuern sollen sie auf jeden Fall dafür zahlen!
TEXT.Italian: Let them do whatever they want ... but tax it.
TEXT.Spanish: Let them do whatever they want ... but tax it.

TEXT.English: Give them funds so that they work for us
TEXT.French: Give them funds so that they work for us
TEXT.German: Gebt ihnen finanzielle Unterstützung. Sie sollen für uns arbeiten!
TEXT.Italian: Give them funds so that they work for us
TEXT.Spanish: Give them funds so that they work for us

TEXT.English: Esus will be pleased of these new followers
TEXT.French: Esus will be pleased of these new followers
TEXT.German: Esus wird angesichts dieser neuen Anhäger gnädig sein
TEXT.Italian: Esus will be pleased of these new followers
TEXT.Spanish: Esus will be pleased of these new followers

TEXT.English: Dark Blades Order
TEXT.French: Dark Blades Order
TEXT.German: Orden der Schwarzen Klingen
TEXT.Italian: Dark Blades Order
TEXT.Spanish: Dark Blades Order

TEXT.English: Night Wolves Chapter
TEXT.French: Night Wolves Chapter
TEXT.German: Bund der Nachtwölfe
TEXT.Italian: Night Wolves Chapter
TEXT.Spanish: Night Wolves Chapter

TEXT.English: Order of the Night Blades
TEXT.French: Order of the Night Blades
TEXT.German: Orden der Schwarzen Klingen
TEXT.Italian: Order of the Night Blades
TEXT.Spanish: Order of the Night Blades

TEXT.English: None yet
TEXT.French: None yet
TEXT.German: Kein Eintrag
TEXT.Italian: None yet
TEXT.Spanish: None yet

TEXT.English: gives the Dark Blades Order Promo to Assassins and Shadows trained in this town
TEXT.French: gives the Dark Blades Order Promo to Assassins and Shadows trained in this town
TEXT.German: Gibt allen in dieser Stadt ausgebildeten Meuchelmördern und Schatten die Beförderung 'Orden der Schwarzen Klingen'
TEXT.Italian: gives the Dark Blades Order Promo to Assassins and Shadows trained in this town
TEXT.Spanish: gives the Dark Blades Order Promo to Assassins and Shadows trained in this town

TEXT.English: Chapter of the Night Wolves
TEXT.French: Chapter of the Night Wolves
TEXT.German: Bund der Nachtwölfe
TEXT.Italian: Chapter of the Night Wolves
TEXT.Spanish: Chapter of the Night Wolves

TEXT.English: None yet
TEXT.French: None yet
TEXT.German: Bisher kein Eintrag
TEXT.Italian: None yet
TEXT.Spanish: None yet

TEXT.English: gives the Night Wolves Chapter Promo to Assassins and Shadows trained in this town
TEXT.French: gives the Night Wolves Chapter Promo to Assassins and Shadows trained in this town
TEXT.German: Gibt allen in dieser Stadt ausgebildeten Meuchelmördern und Schatten die Beförderung 'Bund der Nachtwölfe'
TEXT.Italian: gives the Night Wolves Chapter Promo to Assassins and Shadows trained in this town
TEXT.Spanish: gives the Night Wolves Chapter Promo to Assassins and Shadows trained in this town

TEXT.English: The witch managed to escape from her cell before the execution and cursed your troops on her way out.
TEXT.French: The witch managed to escape from her cell before the execution and cursed your troops on her way out.
TEXT.German: Die Hexe ist vor ihrer Exekution aus ihrer Zelle geflohen und hat kurz vor ihrem Verschwinden Eure Truppen verflucht.
TEXT.Italian: The witch managed to escape from her cell before the execution and cursed your troops on her way out.
TEXT.Spanish: The witch managed to escape from her cell before the execution and cursed your troops on her way out.

TEXT.English: The woman you spared was indeed a witch, and she offered her services in exchange of her life
TEXT.French: The woman you spared was indeed a witch, and she offered her services in exchange of her life
TEXT.German: Die Frau war tatsächlich eine Hexe, und sie hat Euch ihre Dienste angeboten, im Tausch gegen ihr Leben.
TEXT.Italian: The woman you spared was indeed a witch, and she offered her services in exchange of her life
TEXT.Spanish: The woman you spared was indeed a witch, and she offered her services in exchange of her life

TEXT.English: Grateful Witch
TEXT.French: Sorcière reconnaissante
TEXT.German: Grateful Witch
TEXT.Italian: Grateful Witch
TEXT.Spanish: Grateful Witch

TEXT.English: The woman you spared was no witch at all, and she gave you her fortune to thank you for saving her life
TEXT.French: The woman you spared was no witch at all, and she gave you her fortune to thank you for saving her life
TEXT.German: Die Frau, die ihr verschont habt, war keine Hexe. Sie hat Euch ihr Vermögen überschrieben, als Dank für die Rettung ihres Lebens.
TEXT.Italian: The woman you spared was no witch at all, and she gave you her fortune to thank you for saving her life
TEXT.Spanish: The woman you spared was no witch at all, and she gave you her fortune to thank you for saving her life

TEXT.English: A rival guild tries to establish a foothold in the city, leading to an assassin war on the rooftops of the city
TEXT.French: A rival guild tries to establish a foothold in the city, leading to an assassin war on the rooftops of the city
TEXT.German: Eine rivalisierende Gilde versucht, in der Stadt Fuß zu fassen. Das führt zu einem Krieg von Meuchelmördern auf den Dächern unserer Stadt.
TEXT.Italian: A rival guild tries to establish a foothold in the city, leading to an assassin war on the rooftops of the city
TEXT.Spanish: A rival guild tries to establish a foothold in the city, leading to an assassin war on the rooftops of the city

TEXT.English: Kill all of them
TEXT.French: Kill all of them
TEXT.German: Tötet sie alle.
TEXT.Italian: Kill all of them
TEXT.Spanish: Kill all of them

TEXT.English: Help the ones we have an agreement with.
TEXT.French: Help the ones we have an agreement with.
TEXT.German: Helft denen, mit den wir eine Vereinbarung geschlossen haben.
TEXT.Italian: Help the ones we have an agreement with.
TEXT.Spanish: Help the ones we have an agreement with.

TEXT.English: Support the newcomers!
TEXT.French: Support the newcomers!
TEXT.German: Unterstützt die Neulinge!
TEXT.Italian: Support the newcomers!
TEXT.Spanish: Support the newcomers!

TEXT.English: Send Aeron's Chosen to "negociate"
TEXT.French: Send Aeron's Chosen to "negociate"
TEXT.German: Schickt den 'Erwählten des Aeron'. Er soll "verhandeln".
TEXT.Italian: Send Aeron's Chosen to "negociate"
TEXT.Spanish: Send Aeron's Chosen to "negociate"

TEXT.English: Spawns Barbarian Assassins from both guilds
TEXT.French: Spawns Barbarian Assassins from both guilds
TEXT.German: Erzeugt Barbarische Meuchelmörder beider Gilden
TEXT.Italian: Spawns Barbarian Assassins from both guilds
TEXT.Spanish: Spawns Barbarian Assassins from both guilds

TEXT.English: Treasure Hunter
TEXT.French: Chasseur de trésors
TEXT.German: Treasure Hunter
TEXT.Italian: Treasure Hunter
TEXT.Spanish: Treasure Hunter

TEXT.English: While wandering in a foreign market, your unit bought a little locked chest with the Mark of the Three. What do you want to do ?
TEXT.French: While wandering in a foreign market, your unit bought a little locked chest with the Mark of the Three. What do you want to do ?
TEXT.German: Eure Einheit hat auf einem fremden Markt eine kleine, verschlossene Kiste erstanden. Sie trägt das Zeichen der Drei! Was soll sie damit tun?
TEXT.Italian: While wandering in a foreign market, your unit bought a little locked chest with the Mark of the Three. What do you want to do ?
TEXT.Spanish: While wandering in a foreign market, your unit bought a little locked chest with the Mark of the Three. What do you want to do ?

TEXT.English: Open the Chest!
TEXT.French: Open the Chest!
TEXT.German: Öffne die Kiste!
TEXT.Italian: Open the Chest!
TEXT.Spanish: Open the Chest!

TEXT.English: In the chest you find a clue to the next hideout of Malus :[NEWLINE]"Dead beyond dead, in no vault does it reside;[NEWLINE]That which was once the ocean's pride."
TEXT.French: In the chest you find a clue to the next hideout of Malus :[NEWLINE]"Dead beyond dead, in no vault does it reside;[NEWLINE]That which was once the ocean's pride."
TEXT.German: In der Kiste findet Ihr einen Hinweis auf das nächste Versteck von Malus:[NEWLINE]"Dead beyond dead, in no vault does it reside;[NEWLINE]That which was once the ocean's pride."[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Auf deutsch frei übersetzt:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]"Tot jenseits allen Todes, in keiner Gruft wohnt es;[NEWLINE]was einst der Stolz des Ozeans war."
TEXT.Italian: In the chest you find a clue to the next hideout of Malus :[NEWLINE]"Dead beyond dead, in no vault does it reside;[NEWLINE]That which was once the ocean's pride."
TEXT.Spanish: In the chest you find a clue to the next hideout of Malus :[NEWLINE]"Dead beyond dead, in no vault does it reside;[NEWLINE]That which was once the ocean's pride."

TEXT.English: In the chest you find a clue to the next hideout of Malus :[NEWLINE]"Here, She who seeks death made her lair[NEWLINE]Here were raised the most terrible pair"
TEXT.French: In the chest you find a clue to the next hideout of Malus :[NEWLINE]"Here, She who seeks death made her lair[NEWLINE]Here were raised the most terrible pair"
TEXT.German: In der Kiste findet Ihr einen Hinweis auf das nächste Versteck von Malus:[NEWLINE]"Here, She who seeks death made her lair[NEWLINE]Here were raised the most terrible pair"[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Auf deutsch frei übersetzt:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]"Hier hat sie, die den Tod sucht, sich eingerichtet[NEWLINE]hier, wo das schrecklichste aller Paare aufgezogen wurde."
TEXT.Italian: In the chest you find a clue to the next hideout of Malus :[NEWLINE]"Here, She who seeks death made her lair[NEWLINE]Here were raised the most terrible pair"
TEXT.Spanish: In the chest you find a clue to the next hideout of Malus :[NEWLINE]"Here, She who seeks death made her lair[NEWLINE]Here were raised the most terrible pair"

TEXT.English: In the chest you find a clue to the next hideout of Malus :[NEWLINE]"Carved into the earth is this terrible gate.[NEWLINE]Between life and death is a mysterious fate."
TEXT.French: In the chest you find a clue to the next hideout of Malus :[NEWLINE]"Carved into the earth is this terrible gate.[NEWLINE]Between life and death is a mysterious fate."
TEXT.German: In der Kiste findet Ihr einen Hinweis auf das nächste Versteck von Malus:[NEWLINE]"Carved into the earth is this terrible gate.[NEWLINE]Between life and death is a mysterious fate."[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Auf deutsch frei übersetzt:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]"Diese furchtbare Portal ist in den Erdboden gemeißelt[NEWLINE]Zwischen Leben und Tod, das ist ein geheimnisvolles Geschick."
TEXT.Italian: In the chest you find a clue to the next hideout of Malus :[NEWLINE]"Carved into the earth is this terrible gate.[NEWLINE]Between life and death is a mysterious fate."
TEXT.Spanish: In the chest you find a clue to the next hideout of Malus :[NEWLINE]"Carved into the earth is this terrible gate.[NEWLINE]Between life and death is a mysterious fate."

TEXT.English: In the chest you find a clue to the next hideout of Malus :[NEWLINE]"The old wizard sealed his student within.[NEWLINE]This place still echoes with his sin."

TEXT.English: What you found in the little chest was a simple scroll, covered with glyphs. Your mages explain that it's a summoning scroll, usable by anyone who knows the calling words. Once they gave you the words and what was supposed to be summoned. You go to the creek where your ship is anchored.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]"In Heaven or in Hell , I shall know no other master than the endless seas,[NEWLINE]In Life or in Death , I shall follow no other guide than the ever-changing winds,[NEWLINE]In Peace or in War, I shall trust no other flag than the one crowning my ship,[NEWLINE]Over Lands and Seas, I shall sail , live and die on The Flying Patrian!"[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Once those words were said, the skies darkened, forcing you to take shelter. At the worst of the tempest, the seas seemed to split , opening the way for a mighty shadow. Once it was done, you saw something you'd never have thought possible. A ship had appeared in the creek, but not on the seas, it was waiting for its new captain , dozens of feet over the ground.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Legendary Vessel , The Flying Patrian was reborn.
TEXT.French: What you found in the little chest was a simple scroll, covered with glyphs. Your mages explain that it's a summoning scroll, usable by anyone who knows the calling words. Once they gave you the words and what was supposed to be summoned. You go to the creek where your ship is anchored.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]"In Heaven or in Hell , I shall know no other master than the endless seas,[NEWLINE]In Life or in Death , I shall follow no other guide than the ever-changing winds,[NEWLINE]In Peace or in War, I shall trust no other flag than the one crowning my ship,[NEWLINE]Over Lands and Seas, I shall sail , live and die on The Flying Patrian!"[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Once those words were said, the skies darkened, forcing you to take shelter. At the worst of the tempest, the seas seemed to split , opening the way for a mighty shadow. Once it was done, you saw something you'd never have thought possible. A ship had appeared in the creek, but not on the seas, it was waiting for its new captain , dozens of feet over the ground.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Legendary Vessel , The Flying Patrian was reborn.
TEXT.German: In der kleinen Kiste findet Ihr eine einfache, mit Schriftzeichen beschrieben Schriftrolle. Eure Magier erklären Euch, dass es sich um einen Beschwörungszauber, von jedem zu verwenden, der die Beschwörungsformel kennt. Dann geben sie Euch diese Formel, deren Worte und erläutern, was damit beschworen werden kann. Ihr kehrt zu der Bucht zurück, wo Euer Schiff vor Anker liegt.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]"In Heaven or in Hell , I shall know no other master than the endless seas,[NEWLINE]In Life or in Death , I shall follow no other guide than the ever-changing winds,[NEWLINE]In Peace or in War, I shall trust no other flag than the one crowning my ship,[NEWLINE]Over Lands and Seas, I shall sail , live and die on The Flying Patrian!"[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Auf deutsch frei übersetzt:[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]"Im Himmel wie in der Hölle, Ich werde keinen Meister als die endlose See anerkennen,[NEWLINE]Im Leben wie im Tod, Ich werden keinem Führer folgen als den ewig wechselnden Winden, [NEWLINE]Im Frieden wie im Krieg, Ich werde keinem anderem Banner folgen als dem meines Schiffes,[NEWLINE]Über Land und See werde ich segeln, leben und sterben an Bord des 'Fliegenden Patrianers'!" [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Sobal diese Worte gesprochen sind, verdunkelt sich der Himmel, und Ihr sucht Schutz. Am Höhepunkt des Unwetters, öffnet sich die See und öffnet damit den Weg für einen mächtigen Schatten. Nachdem es vollbracht ist, erblickt Ihr etwas, von dem Ihr dachtet, das es nicht existieren kann. Ein Schiff erscheint in der Bucht, doch nicht im Wasser, es wartet auf seinen neuen Kapitän, Dutzende Meter über dem Boden.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Das legendäre Schiff, Der Fliegende Patrianer wurde geboren.

Once they gave you the words and what was supposed to be summoned. You go to the creek where your ship is anchored.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]"In Heaven or in Hell , I shall know no other master than the endless seas,[NEWLINE]In Life or in Death , I shall follow no other guide than the ever-changing winds,[NEWLINE]In Peace or in War, I shall trust no other flag than the one crowning my ship,[NEWLINE]Over Lands and Seas, I shall sail , live and die on The Flying Patrian!"[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Once those words were said, the skies darkened, forcing you to take shelter. At the worst of the tempest, the seas seemed to split , opening the way for a mighty shadow. Once it was done, you saw something you'd never have thought possible. A ship had appeared in the creek, but not on the seas, it was waiting for its new captain , dozens of feet over the ground.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The Legendary Vessel , The Flying Patrian was reborn.

TEXT.English: After exploring the area, your unit finds an hideout and a chest with the Mark of the Three. Your unit quickly leaves the area with the chest, trying to avoid the potential guardians
TEXT.French: After exploring the area, your unit finds an hideout and a chest with the Mark of the Three. Your unit quickly leaves the area with the chest, trying to avoid the potential guardians
TEXT.German: Nachdem sie die Umgebung erkundet hat, findet Eure Einheit ein Versteck und eine Kiste mit dem Zeichen der Drei. Eure Einheit verlässt die Gegend mit der Kiste, um nicht möglichen Wächtern in die Arme zu laufen.

TEXT.English: The Flying Patrian
TEXT.French: Le Patrien Volant
TEXT.German: Der Fliegende Patrianer
TEXT.Italian: The Flying Patrian
TEXT.Spanish: The Flying Patrian

TEXT.English: "In Heaven or in Hell , I shall know no other master than the endless seas,[NEWLINE]In Life or in Death , I shall follow no other guide than the ever-changing winds,[NEWLINE]In Peace or in War, I shall trust no other flag than the one crowning my ship,[NEWLINE]Over Lands and Seas, I shall sail , live and die on The Flying Patrian!"
TEXT.French: "In Heaven or in Hell , I shall know no other master than the endless seas,[NEWLINE]In Life or in Death , I shall follow no other guide than the ever-changing winds,[NEWLINE]In Peace or in War, I shall trust no other flag than the one crowning my ship,[NEWLINE]Over Lands and Seas, I shall sail , live and die on The Flying Patrian!"
TEXT.German: "Im Himmel wie in der Hölle, Ich werde keinen Meister als die endlose See anerkennen,[NEWLINE]Im Leben wie im Tod, Ich werden keinem Führer folgen als den ewig wechselnden Winden, [NEWLINE]Im Frieden wie im Krieg, Ich werde keinem anderem Banner folgen als dem meines Schiffes,[NEWLINE]Über Land und See werde ich segeln, leben und sterben an Bord des 'Fliegenden Patrianers'!"
TEXT.Italian: "In Heaven or in Hell , I shall know no other master than the endless seas,[NEWLINE]In Life or in Death , I shall follow no other guide than the ever-changing winds,[NEWLINE]In Peace or in War, I shall trust no other flag than the one crowning my ship,[NEWLINE]Over Lands and Seas, I shall sail , live and die on The Flying Patrian!"

TEXT.English: A wandering bard has started performing in front of your cities monument.
TEXT.French: Un barde errant a commencé à se produire devant le monument de votre ville.
TEXT.German: Ein wandernder Barde hat begonnen, vor dem Denkmal eurer Stadt aufzutreten.
TEXT.Italian: Un bardo errante ha iniziato a esibirsi davanti al monumento della tua città.
TEXT.Spanish: Un bardo errante ha comenzado a actuar frente al monumento de tu ciudad.

TEXT.English: He is horribly off-key! take his donations and chase him away!
TEXT.French: Il est horriblement faux ! Prenez ses dons et chassez !
TEXT.German: Er ist schrecklich daneben! Nimm seine Spenden und verjage ihn!
TEXT.Italian: È terribilmente stonato! Prendi le sue donazioni e caccialo via!
TEXT.Spanish: ¡Está horriblemente desafinado! ¡Toma sus donaciones y ahuyenta a él!

TEXT.English: He is annoying, but the tunes are kind of catchy...
TEXT.French: Il est embêtant, mais les airs sont un peu accrocheurs...
TEXT.German: Er ist nervig, aber die Melodien sind irgendwie eingängig...
TEXT.Italian: È fastidioso, ma le melodie sono un po' orecchiabili...
TEXT.Spanish: Es molesto, pero las melodías son un poco pegadizas...

TEXT.English: Throw the loud fool in chains.
TEXT.French: Jetez l'imbécile bruyant dans les chaînes.
TEXT.German: Wirf den lauten Narren in Ketten.
TEXT.Italian: Getta in catene lo sciocco rumoroso.
TEXT.Spanish: Encadenar al tonto ruidoso.
